audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: If anything feels unfamiliar or unaccommodating, you can always ask me for help, Rover. This isn't only because you are our guest. It's just... you have no memory or any friends here in Jinzhou. I think there might be moments when you'd need me.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Since I became an Outrider, I've met people from all walks of life in the wild. Some always seemed in such haste, yet remained unsure where they were heading, and often ended up lost. On the other hand, those who had a clear destination in mind usually did make it, despite arduous roads and occasional stumbles. I aspire to be one of the latter, and leaving home for Jinzhou was the first step I took.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: I've been able to hear what the Streams have to tell me for as long as I can remember. They are not sounds produced by the vibrations of air, nor sentences spoken in any known language. They are signals carried by the wind, tangible to me whenever I focus myself to feel those incorporeal, rippling airstreams. The wind that flowed beside my ears just whispered another spellbinding story. Do you wish to hear it?

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: The Streams make an unusual ripple whenever they flow beside you, as if they are being drawn to you once they come close. I don't know what that implies, but I'm sure I won't settle for standing aside and watching, no matter the implications. If circumstances permit, I want to face everything with you.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Call my name whenever you need me. From desolate lands to vibrant cities, from the beginning prologue to the final epilogue... no matter what awaits us in the end of this journey, no matter what kind of storm you are about to bring, I want to witness everything with you, as long as you'd let me.

audios.title: Yangyang's_Hobby
audios.description: Songs are resonating thoughts from the bottom of our hearts. They represent a person's truest feelings.

audios.title: Yangyang's_Trouble
audios.description: I want to do as much as I can for everyone in need, but if I take on more than I can handle... I guess it would only trouble those on the receiving end of my help, and burden me further.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Wuthercake is a national dish in Huanglong, though how it is made varies depending on the region. They make delicious Wuthercakes here in Jinzhou, but for me, homemade Wuthercakes are always the best. When we have the chance, would you come home with me, and have a taste of my mother's Wuthercakes?

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Shouldn't we cherish all food and not let any go to waste? Oh... Well, if it's truly badly cooked, then.. uhm...

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: We all have an appreciation for beauty, but life isn't always full of it. I don't want to always rely on the comforts and safety others provide me with. I must be brave to face the ugly truth. I must be one that guards and gives.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Interested in my ribbon? It's a farewell gift from my mother back when I left for Jinzhou. I consider it a sign of a new chapter in my life, one which symbolizes rebirth. I hope it will continue to remind me I should always follow my heart.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: My senses are sharper than most, though it used to cause me severe distress. Various stimuli seemed to come at me from all directions, slamming into my mind at once. I felt like a lone feather, tossed around in a wild storm. Don't worry... I am okay now. I have found a way to stabilize myself in the Streams, and it was the Stream's message that led me to you.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Today is very special. It's your big day. So... *clears throat* happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you... Rover, I hope I can sing for you on your birthday this year, then your next birthday, and then the birthday after your next birthday.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Buoyant and languid... where will the wind take you?

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: With every meeting... comes the inevitable parting. Let's not dwell on it.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I am Yangyang, a temporary Outrider of the Midnight Rangers, responsible for detecting and investigating anomalies. The Streams have guided me to you. I have a feeling we'll be companions for many moons to come.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: The skylark's song is about to sound.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: I will do my best to help everyone.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: The Streams are getting louder. What do they have to tell me?

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: I've never felt such strength in me. It's all thanks to you, isn't it? I am forever grateful, Rover, for everything you've done for me.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Streams are converging from all sides, and I stand in their midst, expecting the wind's arrival.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I dedicate my song to brilliance, braving the raging storm. The skylark in me has never soared higher into the heavens.

audios.title: Injured_III
audios.description: I should... Give it my all...

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: On the dangerous frontiers where we suffered immense losses, it was General Jiyan who stepped up to protect everyone, making all the tough decisions to ensure our safety. As the backbone of the Midnight Rangers, he has led us to countless victories as our Qingloong. The weight on his shoulders is beyond our imagination.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: "When in trouble, ask Chixia, the Ally of Justice!" This statement, while playful, rings very true. With her surging passion, seasoned prowess, and abundant vigor, Chixia already meets every quality a hero should have, helping the people in need.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Baizhi has a unique approach to comprehending and accomplishing tasks, but that doesn't make her a difficult person to talk to. When you ask her for help, you may notice a flicker of surprise on her face, but you will never receive a refusal.

audios.title: About_Danjin
audios.description: I met Danjin a few times on different occasions. I could tell how much she values justice. She is very clear about when to unsheath her blade, and for what she fights, despite being surprisingly young. Her actions reflect her belief in an ideal world—one that she is determined to create.

audios.title: About_Taoqi
audios.description: Ms. Taoqi is always gracefully poised. She is the kind of person to quickly produce multiple solutions with ease in the most urgent situations, with a smile on her face: "Don't worry. I've got it sorted." Her seemingly unhurried demeanor must have been earned through hard work that we don't know about.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: The Streams have guided me to you. I have a feeling we'll be companions for many moons to come.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: This is it... Rover, you have already done so much for me, I shouldn't ask for more. From now on, I want to be the one taking care of you. Please... will you let me? I hope I can be the one to embrace all that you are, and share with you all that you carry.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: This is the answer to our endeavor.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: This should suffice for a while.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: It sucks that you can't remember your past, there must've been a lot of unforgettable memories. But no worries, we can create new ones. You and I, together!

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: You should check out Uncle Mahe's for freshest groceries and Auntie Panhua's for the best cuisines. Oh, I'm not saying this because we're related. The food's just that good! Say, I'll bring you over so you can give 'em a try yourself when we have the time.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Auntie Panhua always told me how tastebuds can store memories. Maybe the taste of a familiar dish could jog your memory? Even if that fails, a yummy meal will certainly lift your spirits! I want to make everyone happy, especially you.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Overdash racing, hero plays, plus the secret bases out in the suburbs... There are so many more places that I want to take you to. I've never been hyped for days off like this before you came. It's amazing how time flies when we're together!

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Even I can tell you're different from us... One day you'll leave for somewhere far away, right? Well, when the day comes, do take this Fiamma sticker, this wristlet I made, plus this jar of homemade Victor Savor... What? That's too much to carry? I-I just want you to think of me when we're not together!

audios.title: Chixia's_Hobby
audios.description: The hero plays at Jinzhou Theater are the bee's knees! Especially during New Years, everyone would gather around to enjoy the plays, havin' a whale of a time.

audios.title: Chixia's_Trouble
audios.description: You see, heroes can defeat bad guys with just a few whams 'n' bams in plays. But that isn't so easy in real life. They're like those pesky Excarats, you whack one here and another pops up somewhere else, like those TDs in the wilds, those no-good bandits, and those weirdos in red... Ahem. Anyway, just keep 'em comin' alright. I'll take 'em all on!

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Victor Savor! That sauce is so good, you'll munch an old shoe with it.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: What's there to be picky about? I'm good with any food, as long as it fills my tummy.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: I've always wanted to become a hero! A hero matching Speedster and Fiamma, bringing hope and courage to all!

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: I used to fight with nothing more than my flames, but now I have these pistols. I'll hold on tight to whatever weapon I can have, so I can protect everyone!

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: I was really scared of the dark when I was little, but "Fiamma" would always arrive in time to drive it away. Now that I'm all grown up, I'm not scared anymore. I can be my own torch!

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy Birthday! Try this, I made this bow of Maocai all by myself, with extra Victor Savor added just for you. Eat up while it's still steamin'! Don't worry about the spiciness, it's a good omen!

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: Everyone's safe and sound? Looks like I didn't practice for nothing, then!

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Jinzhou Patroller, Chixia. You can always call on me if you ever find yourself in a pickle!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Huggghhh... I can feel the power! And the flames rising!

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: At this rate, the entire Jinzhou City... No wait. The entirety of Huanglong shall be known to the heroic Chixia's name!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I've become a Human Torch! I am flame! With this power, I can now protect everyone, including someone as strong as you!

audios.title: Injured_III
audios.description: I can do this all day!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: Now, what do we have here? Ya can't hide from me!

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: Yangyang's such a darling, even her words sound pretty! Sometimes I can't quite get what she says though. Whatcha call those again? Ah, poems, I think!

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Speaking of Baizhi, she's not the talkative type. Don't get me wrong, she's not an Ice Queen! She just has her own ways of expressing emotions. You'll get it once you've spent enough time with her.

audios.title: About_Yinlin
audios.description: She was once the thunder that lit up my path ahead. I've always wanted to be like her, until I realized not everyone had that power. Now, I am happy with being a small flicker of flame, doing what I can to help people around me.

audios.title: About_Lingyang
audios.description: Sometimes they'd perform lion dance between hero plays. That leading dancer, Lingyang, can put on quite a show for a small guy like him! The way he moves and swings around really makes for an awesome lion!

audios.title: About_Rover
audios.description: You don't talk much, but you're so strong in battle. There's a good old Huanglong saying, "A cat that catches mice doesn't meow." Fits perfectly on you, doesn't it?

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Chixia, Ally of Justice, at your service! Are you the one in need of a hero?

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Whoa! You've made me so much stronger than I could have ever imagined! Now I'm finally the superhero I've always wanted to be! You've been here for me every step of the way, and you'll forever be the one I want to protect the most!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Ohhh... please have something good this time!

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Do you know? The little flower next to you really likes you! I heard it talking about it. Plants talk in a silent and sincere language. I can translate their talk for you, if you want.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: You saw me in the Dim Forest late at night? My bad, I was probably too caught up waiting for a Noctemint to blossom to notice you. Those plants wait their whole lives for that one bloom. I think they'd be happy to have someone there, witnessing and recording it all.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: O-of course we can talk about something other than plants. I do take breaks from the greenhouse, you know. Um... Do you like Morri Pot? The various types of mushrooms in it are so... What? M-mushrooms are not plants. They're fungi!

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: When you have the time, how about we take a walk together? The world is going to look very different when you don't have a particular destination in mind. Want to give it a try?

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Sometimes, it feels like the two of us are dandelion seeds, drifting wherever the wind takes us. We have our ups and downs, just like weathering a storm, but one day we may finally land and flourish, after a good rain. Rover, as fellow travelers, let's embrace what lies ahead, wherever and whenever we may be. To me, that's what truly makes life worth living.

audios.title: Verina's_Hobby
audios.description: During my free time, I enjoy strolling around Jinzhou on my own. Every brick and tile looks slightly different from one another, and I can find resilient little flowers growing in the cracks. The streets are always bustling with people, and the smell of steaming food brings a cozy atmosphere. Whenever I wander around and take in all these sights and sensations, I feel... hmm, is "invigorated" the right word for it?

audios.title: Verina's_Trouble
audios.description: I've noticed a trend of people sharing Terminal-generated images online, saying those must be new plant species. While I understand their interest and curiosity, I'm worried this could mislead the public. As a botanist myself, I always try to be accurate and honest when I'm sharing information about plants. I've been wanting to find a way to help people tell the difference between fake images and real photos, but it seems there's still a lot of work to do. What should I do...

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: My mom always said milk would help me grow taller, like how plants need fertilizer. And every time I drink it, I feel warm and cozy. Maybe that's what happiness feels like.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: I'm not a big fan of big, greasy dishes—like steaks... It's not that they aren't tasty, I just hate the idea of letting food go to waste if I can't finish it. It doesn't sit right with me...

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Maintaining a balanced ecosystem is no easy feat, especially when it involves regulating the population of various species. But what if we could grow flowers that have a calming effect on the Tacet Discords? This could greatly reduce the strain on our frontline soldiers and potentially save lives.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: My adventure journal isn't just about plants. Check it out - this story is about an old lady patiently waiting for a flower to bloom, and this one is about an adventurer going all out to snap a photo of a rare type of grass. Each leaf represents a unique story that has bloomed into something beautiful. I wrote them down to remember every one of these stories.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: When I was little, I thought showcasing the beauty of flowers would make people appreciate and protect them... Reality hit me hard when I saw people plucking and flaunting expensive flowers instead. It used to upset me, but then I'd remind myself: Verina, remember the value of every plant's life. Remember what mom and dad had wanted you to do.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: H-here. This Starflower is for you, and it represents... hope and miracles. Happy birthday! Sorry, I'm not really used to celebrating other people's birthdays yet, erm... Yeah. I just want you to always be happy, Rover.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Wow, such a rare species! It's my lucky day!

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: Can you hear it? Shh... That's the sound of sprouting.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I'm Verina. If you come across any plants that pique your interest, do let me know! Huh? You want me to go on field researches with you? Of-of course! It's my honor. But it can get quite dangerous out in the wild. Please be careful and stay close to me.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Sprouting marks the inception of a plant's journey, a tiny miracle in motion.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: As I grow, even my breaths feel lighter...

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Now is the time to bloom... I didn't realize I was holding my breath. Look. It's so beautiful!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Look, it's bearing tiny fruits! Another miracle, but the journey of a plant doesn't end here.

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: Miss Yangyang was curious about my plant growing skills, and she asked me many questions earlier. Then, she patiently listened to me explaining details for a long, long time. Hanging out with her feels like basking in a gentle breeze.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Miss Chixia once fed me a spoonful of her Victor Savor... I-I couldn't believe how spicy it was! What kind of pepper was that? Ow, my mouth still burns just thinking about it.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Did you know? "Baizhi" is actually an old name for Angelica, a plant that can bloom beautiful flowers in freezing temperatures. It kinda makes me think of Miss Baizhi herself—some might say she seems a bit chilly, but I have a feeling she's got a warm and gentle heart underneath.

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Mr. Mortefi's dedication to his work is remarkable, but I do worry about his well-being... I mean, we all know how important the research project is, but a good night's sleep is just as crucial! Whenever I go and check on the nocturnal plants at night, I can see the lights on in his lab from a distance.

audios.title: About_Encore
audios.description: Little Encore is full of intriguing ideas, and she always has a lot of curious questions to ask. Hmm... I've got to keep looking for all the answers she wants. Oh, you're wondering why I call her "little"? Hehe, we're just playing big sister and little baby.

audios.title: About_Calcharo
audios.description: I remember meeting Mr. Calcharo when I was out collecting data in the wild. At first, he didn't seem very approachable... but then he gave me some flower seeds, all super rare species. He's so awesome.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: This flower is for you. I hope it makes you happy!

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: As of late, my thoughts have turned to the wondrous ways in which life flourishes. The fish dance in the sea, the trees root deep in the earth, and the birds take flight in the sky...all thriving and growing in unique ways. You seem to always inspire me to new wonders, too... Would you like to hear about them?

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: Are those little flowers growing inside?

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: It's nature's gift! Let's keep it well.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: ...Ah, apologies, I got sidetracked. My eyes... They see the original frequencies of all living beings. To me, every life appears blurry and chaotic, in the shape of their souls... I knew you were special the moment I laid eyes on you. Other than my lady Jinhsi, you are the only person who looks so clear and true. I just... I haven't gotten used to the sight of you.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: We are all caught in an invisible wheel of karma. We live, we die, and we live again. As time passes, some are bound to leave us behind, having reached their journey's end. All we can do is keep them in our memories and continue forward, until our end comes... What is driving you forward on your journey, Rover?

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: What will I do if I can no longer stay with my lady? Should the day come, either I will have perished, or she will have accomplished her goals, and my service is no longer required. When the hour truly arrives, perhaps I will choose to live like you—as a roving traveler. It should be nice to join you on your journey.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Hmm? What am I thinking about, you ask? I'm wondering what is on your mind at the moment, Rover… I cannot tell your thoughts by observing your frequencies, because you look the way you are to me. Surprisingly... it feels good to not know what you're thinking.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: There is karma in everything we do. The karma you plant at this moment will surely blossom and bear fruit sometime in the future… And for me? I am of course no exception. I believe it is no coincidence that we find ourselves here, together at this very moment.

audios.title: Sanhua's_Hobby
audios.description: Reciting the Heart Sutra brings calmness and enlightenment. Occasionally I would recite it for my lady Jinhsi, but she always started to grow sleepy after a while... You want to hear me recite the Sutra, too? But... you're not going to fall asleep as well, are you?

audios.title: Sanhua's_Trouble
audios.description: You're feeling cold? It's not that easy to keep my power in check—especially when I'm unable to suppress my emotions. Though it doesn't bring much harm, the coldness sometimes inevitably causes trouble for others. Do you not mind? Or... would you prefer to have me share the coldness with you?

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: There is a beverage in Jinzhou, brewed with the petals of a special kind of flower from the Central Plains. I find its mellow sweetness refreshing. People should consume it moderately, though, as dizziness is a common side effect. Me? Oh, I'm immune to that, of course.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: If I must say, I'm not used to spicy foods... Hmm? You were planning to invite me to dine at Panhua Restaurant? Then to Panhua Restaurant, it is. I may not be fond of it, but I can still overcome mere spices.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: This vision... is both a miracle and a curse. If I could ever get rid of it… No, there is no such possibility. If I must endure it for life, then I will turn it into a weapon for my use.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: The delusion one feeds comes back to them in kind... This is what the abbot told me when he gave me these prayer beads. It was a warning for me, but moreso a reminder that everyone has their own demons to fight. Between good and evil lies a thin veil; it takes just one thought to pierce it. I should not be swayed by what others think of me, and instead focus on my spiritual growth to find liberation.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: They once called me the "Demon of Calamity"... Now, I wield this demonic power to protect those dear to me. Rover... do you perceive me as an demon, too? I suppose it doesn't matter either way. No matter what you think of me, I am always ready to cut down any obstacles in your way, as my duty dictates.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Is this your real date of birth? The anniversary of your birth is very much worth celebrating, indeed. From that moment, your life started to unfold; countless karmic events have eventually led you here, standing right before me. This, perhaps, can be called a miracle—Happy Birthday, Rover.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Beautiful beings are beautiful... precisely because of their transiency.

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: What do I think of you? Your smile... It looks warm.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: I should try to smile more, you say? ...Like this? No? ...Maybe like this? Hmm... I may have overdone it. Forget about it.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I am Sanhua, the bodyguard of Magistrate Jinhsi. If you plan to visit dangerous areas, please be sure to bring me along. I will ensure your safety.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Please don't stay too far away from me.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: You can trust me to keep you safe.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: I will cut down any threat in your way.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: The souls... They look clearer to me.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Liberation comes from accepting change and transience.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Now, I am confident to not let you get harmed in the slightest.

audios.title: Fallen_II
audios.description: Karma has caught up to me...

audios.title: About_Jinhsi
audios.description: Lately, my lady prefers to wake up earlier, so I've been waking her up on time every day… Huh? She sometimes prefer to stay in bed a bit longer?! Is that what she told you? What else did she say? Please, do tell me in detail.

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: Jianxin... her soul has a beautiful golden hue, and she is a person of respectable character.

audios.title: About_Lingyang
audios.description: That young liondancer? His soul appears in a unique shape, similar to that of an animal... I'm a little ashamed to admit that I once mistook him for a beast from the wild... Ahem. Don't worry, I have since made a formal apology to him, and we've cleared up the misunderstanding.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Baizhi is a brilliant scholar. I once worked with her on a collaborative project, assigned by Madam Magistrate. She will no doubt become a prominent scholar at the Huaxu Academy, and eventually a significant contributor to the study of Remnant Ecoacoustics in Huanglong.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Greetings, Rover. I will escort you for the time being.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Rover. I joined your side because of my lady's orders, and I will continue to stay with you for the days to come... It has nothing to do with my duties now. I make this vow of my own volition, just for you.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: My luck seems better with you around.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Found something you like? Keep them as you will.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Take your time and enjoy the journey. Don't hurry too much, or you may miss out on all the beautiful sights along the way. You don't want to reach the end of the road with nothing to show for it. Hehe... Just some tips from someone who's been there before.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: I wasn't slacking off, really. I just needed to recharge a little... Aww, you don't believe me? Don't say that. I'll be so hurt.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: It does get overwhelming with so many people counting on you. I know that feeling all too well... Worry not. You can relax a little more when you're with me.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Oh... I fell asleep? ...Hehe, I guess your presence just made me feel that much more at ease. You should get more rest too, Rover. Staying up late too much could lead to hair loss.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: The danger in the air is palpable nowadays. I guess that's why you have come to our aid at a time like this. How unfortunate, I have been hoping to enjoy a peaceful life with you... Anyway. Rover, would you come a little closer? Let's have some leisurely time together, even if only for a little while.

audios.title: Taoqi’s_Hobby
audios.description: Had a great sleep. Ugh... time for work... Gotta get up... but... still 'eepy... Just one more nap...

audios.title: Taoqi's_Trouble
audios.description: I am fully booked for afternoon consultings well into next year, and I heard someone is reselling bookings at high prices... I didn't know it would spiral into this. Honestly, I don't believe my input made much of a difference—in the end, it was up to themselves to solve their own issues.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: I'm all about the easy-to-eat stuff. Give me some creamy, savory porridge any day. Can you help me out with this spoonful? It's a little bit too hot for my tongue.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Hmm... food that requires peeling, I guess. Why? It's too much hassle.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: I really hate working. That said, I've got to put in some effort now so one day I won't have to work anymore. Haha, sure, I could just retire by myself if I want to... but I'm hoping to ease the load off of everyone else once and for all, so we can all enjoy a peaceful life together.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: How do you like it here in Jinzhou? Enjoying your stay? It is my dream to make it a truly safe and cozy place to live, free from all the border city dangers.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: In the past, my friends were always there for me, shielding me from harm. Their presence was steadfast like the city walls, providing me a great sense of security and comfort. That is why I am now driven to build stronger walls for all citizens of Jinzhou, so everyone can enjoy the same comfort and reassurance.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: It's your birthday today. You should take a well-deserved rest. Let's nap together, shall we? I've got the comfiest sleep gear just for you. Sweet dreams, and happy birthday, dear.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Perfect weather for a walk today... Hmm, maybe not...

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: More paperwork? Let's see... *satisfied smile* All set. Now, what should I have for dinner?

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: Sometimes I pretend I was a cloud in the sky... Just drifting by as a soft and fluffy pile, without any worry.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Hi there, I'm Taoqi, in charge of border defense at the Ministry of Development. If you need my help, shoot me a message any time. I'll get back to you during work hours.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: No need to rush. Everything will work out in due time.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: I'll take good care of you.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: Time to work? *chuckle* No more lazing around, then.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: I feel so good right now, I'd say even better than when I just took a seven-day leave. Thank you for your help, Rover.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: My heart is beating faster, and I can hear my blood rushing... This newfound strength is making me feel a bit restless. Maybe I should go get some sleep.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: With more power comes more responsibility... I really don't want more work, but if it's you asking... I can do some overtime. Just a little.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Thank you. You're so reliable, my darling little one. Hmm? You might have actually lived longer than me. Hehe... Now that I'm stronger than ever, I just want to take care of you like a big sister. Can't you just let me?

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: Excited for what's inside? Hehe, aren't you adorable.

audios.title: About_Jinhsi
audios.description: People think Lady Jinhsi is too young to lead, but I don't see the problem. Her young age may be seen as a disadvantage, but it's also her greatest strength. As we work on moving Jinzhou forward, she will go further and accomplish more than any of us can imagine.

audios.title: About_Sanhua
audios.description: Oh, I wish I had someone like Sanhua. Imagine how much easier my work would be with her help. Where on earth did Lady Jinhsi find herself such an incredible bodyguard? I'll have to ask her about it next time we meet.

audios.title: About_Xiangli_Yao
audios.description: Mr. Xiangli? Yes, he is a great collaborator of ours at the Ministry of Development. Our work partially overlaps with the Academy's research projects, and I consult him daily. Despite his genius intellect and quick thinking, I have no issue keeping up with his ideas.

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: General Jiyan's schedule is always so impossibly tight... He seems to keep finding more issues to take care of, like a devoted parent who never allows himself any rest. Maybe it's his doctor instincts, always putting others first. I really hope he can take some time off for his own well-being.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Time for another afternoon consultation, I see. What's on your mind today?

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: You have opened my eyes to things I've never noticed before. Safety isn't found in one person building a "wall." It comes from supporting each other, and cherishing shared moments. Thank you for always being here for me. If we could stay like this forever, I... Hmm? You didn't catch that last sentence? Hehe, I'll say it again for you, then...

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: My luck seems good like always.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: You possess special powers related to sound. By observing you... I may be able to find a breakthrough in Ecoacoustics studies. If this ever makes you uncomfortable, please do let me know. Maintaining interpersonal relationships is not my strong suit, but I want to keep a balance between satiating my desire for knowledge and respecting your boundaries.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Some believe Remnant Creatures are embodiments of souls. Indeed, their frequencies are pure and clear—qualities commonly associated with the idea of a "soul". That said, I have a question... You'tan stays with me because it embodies my ideals. Then, all those Mutterflies that are attracted to you... What do they represent that is yours? Perhaps... the answer lies within your lost memories.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: My doubt of the then universally accepted Ecoacoustic theories provoked me to direct my research accordingly. I questioned the long-held notion that Remnant Creatures are intangible, and I continued to explore the possibilities, chasing every clue I could find. Eventually, I received a response from You'tan in one of the ruins, disproving that theory. Now, I am posed with a variety of other questions that I'm attempting to answer. I believe a claim is always verifiable before it is discredited entirely, and I will keep striving to uncover the truths.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: The world is constantly changing, but every action has its consequences. Like a Goldberg machine, it may seem unpredictable, but if you trace the steps carefully, you can find a rational outcome. Therefore, we should exercise caution in our decisions to avoid any unwanted outcomes. Even if it means sacrificing comfort, I'm willing to go through complex procedures for accuracy. Rover, between facts and feelings, which holds more weight for you?

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Strange. I was planning to study you as an observer, but now... I am the one opening up to you, telling you things I never thought I would. It feels almost as if... I want you to learn more about me, too. This isn't the plan I had, but somehow, I don't really mind. Perhaps... with more time together, I will deviate further from my usual self, and discover other unexpected feelings.

audios.title: Baizhi's_Hobby
audios.description: When I have the time, I travel around Huanglong to explore. I sample local delicacies, talk to people, and observe their daily lives. Theory alone cannot convey the full truth; to reach an accurate conclusion, I must experience it firsthand.

audios.title: Baizhi's_Trouble
audios.description: Two words with the same pronunciation do not make people laugh, but when used in certain contexts, people seem to automatically associate them with various meanings and burst into laughter... Puns and memes lack a clear definition. I find them difficult to understand.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Vegetables served cold are less prone to moisture loss, and they have a sweeter taste. I recommend iced Perilla salad if you enjoy vegetables, too.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Though fried foods can be delicious, it's best to enjoy them in moderation, due to their potential health risks.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: I wouldn't call the emergence of Waveworn phenomena a 'disaster' that overturned mankind's established knowledge of the world. I believe it has broadened our horizons, prompting us to rethink and reconstruct our system of knowledge. Though we haven't made much progress yet, our continued effort will bring us closer to understanding.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: I wear two rings on my hands. One of them is a reminder of what I should never forget, and the other is a symbol of what I should strive to achieve. My life is too short for trivial matters; I must carry on my pursuit in honor of our pioneers.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Withdraw a portion of one's ego, then attach it to the existence of another being in the form of vibrating energy... sounds incredible, doesn't it? It was in this manner that You'tan came into existence. I am yet to uncover all the secrets of the Remnant Creatures, but perhaps that's why You'tan responded to my call—so I may devote my life in search of the answer.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: You deserve preferential treatment on the day of your birth... Yes, please lean in closer, just like that... You'tan's embrace soothes the body. It has never embraced anyone other than me before today. Happy birthday, Rover. You'tan and I wanted to do something for you. We hope you like it.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Why hesitate, if you know what you want?

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: An unwavering faith will resonate with like-minded souls.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: I have the key to solving this question.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I am Baizhi, a researcher at the Huaxu Academy. I specialize in Ecoacoustic studies, and I'm always open to answering questions related to my field. Hmm... I don't mind other types of questions, but please note that I may not be able to answer all of them. It would be best to let me know what you are going to ask in advance, so I can prepare accordingly.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Talk is cheap. Show me the action.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: May this journey bring us closer to the truth.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: You'tan and I will ensure your safety.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: My thoughts are clearing up, and my resonance with You'tan is getting stronger… This is all because of your help, isn't it?

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: In this world, there are only those things which are not yet known, not those which cannot be known. I seem to be one step closer to the truth I seek.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Your help has opened up a world of potential for You'tan and me. It feels a bit foreign to me to be presented with many options, instead of one single truth... but I rather enjoy this feeling.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: You have helped me gain a previously unknown level of power; in return, I will use this power to its fullest extent for you.

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: Some people are good at listening, while some are good at counseling others. Yangyang is good at both. With her, you can just be yourself.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: When I first met Chixia, I was indeed a bit overwhelmed... She was always vibrant and lively, and her way of thinking was very different from mine. As our understanding of each other grew, we created a unique synergy. Our differences complemented each other perfectly.

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: We didn't converse frequently, but our cooperation was always seamless. He may experience minor inflammation-related health issues because of his Resonance Ability, so I suggest bringing him Bittberry tea next time. A single cup can relieve his symptoms for a whole day.

audios.title: About_Xiangli_Yao
audios.description: His good temper is almost as impressive as the exceptional talent he has. I've never seen him raise his voice in anger at anyone. No matter how impossible the task sounds, he always delivers.

audios.title: About_Yuanwu
audios.description: The tea Mr. Yuanwu brews always tastes sweeter than those served in teahouses, even if the same recipe and ingredients were used. He told me it was only because he put his sincerity into it. Sincerity... How does it affect the flavor of tea?

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: I am Baizhi, a researcher at the Huaxu Academy. Let me witness where this encounter will take us.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Once again, you have demonstrated an unimaginable feat. But compared with how it worked, I am now more curious about you as a person. What kind of new possibilities are you going to show me? I have never felt so much anticipation before... Clearly, you are special to me unlike anyone else.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: You found it, and it's yours to keep.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Isn't weird that there's only one right answer to every question? I mean, even the Woolies in my box aren't all the same. They're not all cute and cuddly. Some may even have pointy teeth! "Baa!" ...You see?

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Do you know what's under the Black Shores' base? Aalto and the others won't ever let me go near. Are they keeping cool stuff and scary things down there?

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Cosmos said you smell full of stories, and Cloudly told me you've been to many, many places. So, here's Encore's question of the day... What does it feel like to walk at night, when there's no stars in the sky? And... how's it like to be out there in the wild, all by yourself?

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: At the end of a show, everybody yells "Encore!" really loud, then the curtains open, and they play another song. That's super cool, right? So... If you're friends with Encore, your story will never come to an end!

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: I've got lots of friends now, but sometimes in my dreams, I'm still all alone. Mommy's not with me anymore, and they say Cosmos and Cloudy are just my imaginary friends… Erm. C-can you hug me a little?

audios.title: Encore's_Hobby
audios.description: What have you been up to today? Did you have fun? Saw anything cool? C'mon, spill the beans! Encore loves stories! And the feelings people share... they're like one story after another!

audios.title: Encore's_Trouble
audios.description: Mommy... will you be there in my dreams?

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Here! You can have this chocolate, and I'll take your Star Flakes! And presto! Now you have yummy chocolate, and I have chocolate-flavored Star Flakes! How's that for a deal? Psst, It's a little trade secret I got from Aalto!

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Ooh… Watch out! The ghosts of food you didn't finish will crawl out of your tummy and give you bad dreams... Boo! Gotcha!

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Maybe one day, Encore will go everywhere in the world and be a hero too. Hehe, but first, what's for breakfast tomorrow?

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Cosmos and Cloudy are presents from mommy. They're my best buddies! Don't worry, they're nice Woolies, they tell me lots and lots of stories!

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Being happy is the bestest feeling, but it can't just be some pretend thing in a dream! Once upon a time, Encore was living in the happiest dream ever... but it had to stop, like all dreams do. Then when a dream is over, it's another brand new day ahead. Let's do our best!

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: ♪Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you...♪ Mommy used to sing this birthday song on Encore's birthdays! Now, Encore is singing it just for you. Here's to a new, happy life!

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: One sheep, two sheep... Three... Um? Where was I?

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: Encore spent a long, long time on this! Wanna have a bite? Hehe!

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Hee-hee. Hi, there! I'm Encore from the Black Shores! Wanna go on an adventure with me and my Woolies?

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Knew it! You can't do without Encore! Off we go!

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: What kinda story will Encore hear today?

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: This is wicked cool! It's just like in the stories... So Encore can beat up a bad dragon now?! Yay!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Woah! Is this "Rover Magic"!? Oh no you don't, you're not going anywhere unless you tell me your secrets!

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: The fire's getting warmer and prettier! Can we share it with other people? Encore wanna be a helper!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Woah, so that's how you did it! Encore's making it part of the story... You'll hear it when you've got the time.

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_II
audios.description: No one picks on Encore's friends!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: Ooh, shiny! It's gotta be a dragon's treasure!

audios.title: About_Aalto
audios.description: Aalto's money this and money that all day, but did you know? Sometimes he helps people for free! He just wouldn't tell me why... Hmph. Then it's up to me to find out!

audios.title: About_Verina
audios.description: Verina's flowers are grown with love! Nothing like the ones they sell in the New Federation! But some of them looked a bit wacky, like the one that gobbled down on Aalto's head and gave him a new haircut… Gotta ask her what it's called next time!

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Friends in Jinzhou told me Mortefi makes lots of fun gadgets and gizmos! That's so cool! Hmm, should I ask him for a bouncy sheep next time...

audios.title: About_Calcharo
audios.description: Psst. Wanna hear a secret? That strange big guy Aalto's been working with is actually... a doggy person! That's why he's a big doggy in Encore's stories!

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: Grown-ups like him have to wear a long face all the time, you know. See? Being a grown-up is really tough!

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Miss Chixia is another one of Encore's besties! She can get a bit strict sometimes, but in a good way! You can call her when you're lost in town, she doesn't mind the extra work.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Woah! Hey! Woolies, make some room! I wanna look, see? ...Black Shores member, Encore, reporting in!

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Your adventure sounds so much fun! Encore really wanna go! Promise you'll take me next time? Pinky swear!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: There has to be more. Right?

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Greetings, Rover whom I've come across in my journey. What are you travelling for? You can't quite recall? Hmm, no worries. I'm sure you will rediscover it along the way.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: I was scared, too, when I first started travelling alone. Especially at night, I had this constant feeling of being followed. That's when I'd start chanting to myself, 'Keep going, don't look back'. Master always said that if I kept pushing forward, I'd eventually reach the light of dawn.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: I've gotten used to walking in the dark, braving the ever-changing weather and rugged roads in the wilderness. That doesn't mean I'm letting my guard down. I'll always keep an eye on the shadows—I won't let them hurt anyone in my reach ever again.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: The path of vengeance that I seek is destined to be filled with darkness and peril, like trudging alone through an endless night. Fortunately, with you around, I won't lose myself so easily.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: With you by my side, I can fight without worry... Even if the crimson haze momentarily clouds my sight, you'll be there to help me break free from it, right?

audios.title: Danjin’s_Hobby
audios.description: I enjoy releasing lanterns into the sky, watching as the solitary lantern in my hand joins the beautiful sea of many lights, setting them free one by one. That sight always fills me with a nostalgic warmth.

audios.title: Danjin's_Trouble
audios.description: Sometimes I get a little carried away in battles... I didn't startle you, did I?

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Will there ever be Loong Whiskers Crisps that are as loooong as a real loong's whiskers? Aww, I really want to give them a try!

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Star Flakes are pretty, but they're a pain to keep fresh. I once packed a pouchful of them to enjoy while I was out in the wild, and they quickly turned soggy and lost their crunch.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Wherever I go, I swear to vanquish evil, whether it's out in the daylight or hiding in the dark.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: No matter what happens, no matter what I've been through, this jade pendant will forever stay clear and bright.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: It's easy to cut down my enemies with a sword swing, but eradicating evil is not as simple. One oversight and it silently regenerates, ready to make a comeback... That's why I must uproot and shatter every trace of evil I see.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy Birthday, Rover! I made these Loong Whiskers Crisps to be as long as those of our great Sentinel. They say eating something long on your birthday makes you live long and prosper. Enjoy!

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: May the moonlight attest my steadfast will.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Greetings, my name is Danjin. I'm currently patrolling the lands as a ranger. Tell me about any injustice you've encountered, and I'll get it dealt with. You can't think of any? That's good.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Hopefully my patience will pay off this time.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Where to? I can lead the way for you.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Now that my blade is faster, I should be able to make cleaner cuts.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: My Crimson Blades are lasting longer, and my whole body feels so light... I never knew this sword could feel so light in my hands.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Vengeance is not mindless killing. It is about identifying the root of malice, and hitting where it truly hurts. Thank you, the move you've taught me has been very useful.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description:
For many years, a crimson rage of vengence had been consuming me, devouring me from within. Now... I can feel it fading away, gradually drown out by the warmth of your kindness. 
With you by my side, I won't have to journey alone... not anymore.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: Hmm, this is a nice find.

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Mortefi may seem a bit intimidating, but he's actually quite nice. Once my blade got really worn out, and Mortefi repaired it for me. To repay his kindness, that week I wiped out several groups of bandits eyeing the Tacetite weapons he developed... He ended up having to repair it for me again.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: You can never go wrong by taking lost children to Chixia. While some kids may find me scary, they would never be scared of her.

audios.title: About_Yinlin
audios.description:
The familiar sight of Yinlin's thunder always reassures me that the upcoming battle will be a breeze. 
Though, I must admit, it took me until at least our tenth collaboration to finally learn her name... Embarrassingly so.

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: When I just met Yangyang, I had been curious how someone could always be such a sweetheart. Later, I finally learned how gentleness with boundary has a powerful strength of its own.

audios.title: About_Rover
audios.description: You always act first in the face of injustice, despite having lost all memories... You must always have been a righteous person, right? I'd be very troubled if it turned out otherwise.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Ranger, Danjin. Worry not, my Crimson Blade will not harm you as long as you haven't done anything bad.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: My eyes have been opened... I'm starting to realize how there's so much more to the world than just fighting for justice. There are countless amazing things waiting to be discovered, and the best part is having you by my side.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Some Loong Whiskers Crisps would be great...

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Being a broker such as myself, it is essential to establish good relationships to maintain a stable customer base. You still have some uncertainties about this world, it seems. We should really establish a connection, you know? If there's ever anything you wish to know in the future, I'll make sure you receive the best price for my services.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Since we're buddies now, here's some quick business tips. Like they say in Huanglong, "your sweet deal might be someone else's poison." It's all about perspective. You can sell the same intel for different prices depending on who you're selling to. Just a little bit of spin and you've got yourself a high-paying customer. Hmm? Nuh-uh, that's not lying! I'd like to call it reasonable strategy in meeting various demands.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Being "popular" attracts wealth… and sometimes unwanted attention. You get the occasional oddball who tries to push for a deal. Well, special customers call for special measures. If only all of 'em were as chill to talk to as you.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Info brokers love to play games with their words. You can't just believe everything they say, but you can't ignore them either. It's like trying to see through fog, but if you put in the effort, you'll uncover real gems hidden beneath their half-truths. But with me, it's easy. You know me, I've always been honest with you, buddy.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: I've been told I'm all about networking, not real friendships. Well, can't say I'd deny that. I don't want anything getting in the way of my judgment, so I tend to keep things strictly business with everyone. But now, I guess you're different. You always are. You have a way of swaying my decisions just by being around, as my friend or not.

audios.title: Aalto's_Hobby
audios.description: In our line of work, being too buddy-buddy with people and exposing weaknesses is a big no-no. Hmm… I can't say 'No' to you, I guess. I don't have anything in particular for hobbies, just some little mist tricks to give everyone a good laugh from time to time.

audios.title: Aalto's_Trouble
audios.description: With everything in this world so unpredictable, why sweat yourself all the time? When you're feeling gloomy, just hit me up. I'll get you straightened out, no strings attached.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Encore's Coral Bowl looks weird, but it sure tastes great. It practically dissolves on your tongue and leaves a nice, mellow flavor. You should give it a try. C'mon, what's up with the side eye? You've got to trust me on this one. The stuff may look like coral, but it's completely harmless, really.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: You know how some people make all kinds of excuses for their poor decisions? Take my old man, for example, pointing the finger at booze for his messed up life. Better stay away from things that numb your mind, don't you agree?

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: To live free as the mist and enjoy life while it lasts. Sounds wonderful, doesn't it?

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Hmm, curious about what this is? Nope—not a bone flute, it's a tape recorder. Funny little devices like this always come in handy in a pinch. Why don't we get you some next time?

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Believe it or not but when I was young, our house was like a revolving door for debt collectors, thanks to my dad's gambling habit. Boy, did I hate my life having to put up with it all back then. So hey, don't you think your poor buddy deserves a few extra clients, after everything he's been through?

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Heya! Happy Birthday, my most special patron! Got you a custom-made mist-maker. It may not look like much, but all you have to do is give it a little twist to have mists of all shapes and sizes... And Voila! Here's a kitten for ya, how'd you like it? Now whenever you're feeling down, just turn your troubles into mist and watch them fade away.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Credibility in the name, and customer satisfaction is the game.

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: I never miss out on a good deal.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Howdy! I'm Aalto, your go-to information broker. I've got all the info you need at fair prices. Knowledge about different places is key to staying ahead while you're out and about. Interested in a quote?

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Any detail along the way could become valuable intel.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Nice pick! You won't regret choosing Aalto's service.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: It's go time! You'll have my mist for escort.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Whew—I can make more mist now. Thanks, I'll offer you something extra next time.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Hmm? You never fail to impress. My mist can reach even further now. Sweet! And that'll be another intel on the house for ya!

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Now I can switch between any kind of mist as I please. Much appreciated, bud! If you need anything, just ask away. I'll do my best to oblige!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Whoa, talk about sincerity. I'll make this worth your while, of course. My mist will be with you at all times, you can trust me to have your back.

audios.title: Resonance_Skill_II
audios.description: Phew. In the nick of time.

audios.title: Resonance_Skill_III
audios.description: How's that for a magic trick?

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_III
audios.description: Lost in the mist of time.

audios.title: Hit_I
audios.description: Can't we just talk this out?

audios.title: Injured_III
audios.description: Time to bring out my A-game.

audios.title: Fallen_II
audios.description: Don't worry... Just a trick of the eye...

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: Well, would you look at that! Easy money.

audios.title: About_Encore
audios.description: Sometimes not even I can figure out just where Encore's getting all that energy from. As soon as we arrive somewhere, she's off making friends and sharing stories with the local kids in no time. I even got some of my intel from her buddies, believe it or not.

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: Being the Jinzhou Garrison's General is no walk in the park. You gotta have that big-picture thinking, be on top of everything, and make decisions like they're nothing. Just take a look at General Jiyan—he's got all those boxes checked off and then some.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Oh, Miss Chixia. Our first convo didn't go quite as planned. I was doing some business in Jinzhou at the time, then she tried to arrest me, probably thought I was some crook. Lucky for me we worked it out later.

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: Miss Yangyang? We haven't talked much, but the way she can tap into the "Streams" for intel is definitely something. As someone in the information game, that really sounds handy. I should see if she's interested in being my informant.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Hmm… Seems unlikely she'll ever be my client. She's the type of person to trust the conclusions from her own research over information provided by anyone else.

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: The Academy's red-haired international research fellow? I heard he's got a way of handling difficult clients. Actually... I was thinking about asking him for some pointers.

audios.title: About_Calcharo
audios.description: I always enjoy doing business with a Ghost Hound. They keep things clean, They're straightforward, and they don't goof around.

audios.title: About_Verina
audios.description: That little girl from Rigg's Explorers? Yeah, I bumped into her once, back in the New Federation. Offered me a Starflower for the whereabouts of her mother. But the deal fell through, because she didn't have what I was asking for. And what was that, you ask? Well… I asked for a never-withering flower. In reply, she told me plants have their life cycle, and wilting is just a natural part of it. I remember telling her, "The same can be said for humans."

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Say, buddy, we should probably take care of those bills you owe me. Let's see here… Hmm, you know what? I actually made a good chunk of change from the intel you asked for, so why don't we just call it even? Swing by anytime and let's do more business!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Aaand… What's inside mystery box No. 01!?

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: G'day. What does our loyal client wish to inquire about today?

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: I have long been stationed in the borderlands, with little knowledge of entertainment or places of leisure. However, if you are looking for tactics against Tacet Discords or beautiful natural vistas, I can provide some suggestions.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: While the borderlands cannot rival the city's clamor and glamor, they do possess their unique charm. Should you find time, I suggest you come and witness the full moon and twinkling stars that grace the tranquil night skies. Rest assured, your safety will not be a concern; I will be there with you.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: The Midnight Rangers are a source of solace for many, while I see them as a scalpel, with the duty of eradicating maladies. Me? I am the hand that guides this scalpel, I suppose.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Soldiers of the Midnight Rangers have entrusted their lives to me. Therefore, every time I wield the scalpel, I must do so with absolute precision so as not to betray their trust. One day, this scalpel will eradicate all Tacet Discords, and when that moment arrives, I hope you can witness it with me.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Flowers in the Knell Square are planted to honor the deceased. These flowers are of a unique variety, and they require significant attention. Here is a cultivation guide. If I fail to keep my promise of witnessing humanity's victory with you, please plant one of these flowers there for me.

audios.title: Jiyan's_Hobby
audios.description: Though I no longer practice medicine, I still discuss medical knowledge with my mother in my spare time. This gourd-shaped pill case is a gift from her the year I joined the Midnight Rangers.

audios.title: Jiyan's_Trouble
audios.description: In just a few days, a thin layer of dust has collected on my desk. Cleaning is not a challenge, but consistency is.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Jinzhou Stew is renowned for its wide variety of ingredients and easy preparation, making it a beloved homemade dish in Jinzhou. Having been stationed in the borderlands for most of my time, I sometimes miss that taste.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: In Jinzhou, there is a vegetable known as "Bittberry". It possesses a bitter and slightly astringent flavor, and is renowned for its detoxifying properties. When I was young, my mother was somehow convinced "those who can endure bitterness will rise above others." She frequently incorporated this vegetable into our meals. I must confess that its taste was far from pleasant. However, now serving in the army, I have grown accustomed to its flavor. After all, resources are scarce, and it is crucial not to squander them.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: If one day, the borderlands no longer need a general, I suppose my wish will have come true.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: This spear was modeled after the weapon of Captain Beiwang, bearing the significance of quelling chaos and warding off external threats.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: My family has been in the medical profession for generations. I once aspired to follow in their footsteps, saving lives and providing care. However, I soon realized that a doctor could never fully alleviate the pain caused by the Tacet Discords. It was this realization that led me to join the Midnight Rangers. Over the years, I have found my way of bringing solace to the world.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: I have worn this vambrace since my first battle. It saved my life countless times. A vambrace like this is believed to bring good luck, ensuring the safe return of soldiers. Though it may show signs of wear, I wish to pass on this luck to you. Additionally, I have prepared a few travel essentials that I hope will prove useful. Happy birthday.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Jiyan, of the Midnight Rangers. Protecting our lands and people is my solemn duty. Should you encounter any difficulties here, I will do my utmost to help.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Should you find yourself lost, follow the banner of the Qingloong.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: When danger arises, take cover behind me.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: The battlefield is dynamic. Do not let your guard down.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: I can sense an improvement in my strength. I suppose you are well-versed in the art of training, too?

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: So you have opted for a prudent strategy this time. Next time, maybe we can consider something more unconventional.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Remarkable strategy. Your insight provides me with unique and refreshing perspectives that I have not considered before.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: With your bold plan, my Qingloong has gained more momentum on the battlefield. I appreciate your assistance.

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Others often perceive Mortefi as arrogant and unapproachable, but, in fact, he is not that hard to talk to. Remember to be direct with him, as trying to be overly polite and subtle may only lead to misunderstandings.

audios.title: About_Jinhsi
audios.description: The "battle" Magistrate Jinhsi has been taking on may prove more complicated than our situation in the borderlands: stipulating rules, overseeing trade, ensuring the well-being of the people, and managing the city's functioning all demand her coordination and judgement. Every time I return to Jinzhou, I can feel the city's vibrancy and enthusiasm, all thanks to her meticulous governance.

audios.title: About_Taoqi
audios.description: Taoqi... Though our views on loose management don't always align, I am able to focus on the front lines without any worries, thanks to her effective leadership in maintaining Jinzhou's fortifications.

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: She can perceive minute changes in the surroundings from the Streams, but there is a limit to the amount of information a single person can take in. Excessive use of this ability might add to her burden, and I hope she won't strain herself.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Many stumble through life directionless, without ever finding a purpose. Baizhi is among the rare few who have found their calling, and she is willing to give up anything for the truth she pursues.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: That energetic and passionate Patroller? Yes, I have heard of her. She has been devoting her time to protecting the dreams of children in Jinzhou.

audios.title: About_Aalto
audios.description: Fog can be an enemy to soldiers on the march, as it limits visibility and complicates situational awareness. However, deploying fog strategically can be an effective move on the battlefield. I have had the opportunity to work with Aalto before, and he is an interesting person indeed.

audios.title: About_Encore
audios.description: Are you referring to the little girl who is always seen by Aalto's side? I have met her once. She and Aalto complement each other perfectly, personality wise.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: I have never regretted braving the long night.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Wouldn't hurt to be more prepared.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Commanding an army is not a simple task, and sometimes I find myself questioning my own decisions. Going forward, with you staying by my side, I should feel more at ease.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: The Academy is working as fast as a Hoartoise. So many mysteries about you remain unanswered, yet my research proposals are still pending approval.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: As a lone traveler, there must've been times when you were taken advantage of, but couldn't retaliate on the spot. If you ever find yourself in such a situation again... do not hesitate to bring me along.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Many believe having "talent" is a blessing, but ignore the curse that comes along: someday fate might take it away, quietly. Don't take your talent for granted—make the most of it, before it's too late.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Creating and sustaining connections requires reading between the lines, and speaking words that please... Even the same words can be interpreted differently, depending on the tone and context. It's too complicated for my liking. This is why I prefer straightforward individuals... and I'm glad you are one.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: A powerful weapon can bring either justice, or devastation. The character and conviction of its wielder dictate how it's used, and that has a bearing on the judgement of those who crafted it. Now, if I entrust my works to you... to where will this decision lead me?

audios.title: Mortefi's_Hobby
audios.description: Music composition follows intricate regulations, much like balancing mathematical equations. This attention to rationalism is profound in classical music. I remember reading a score that sounded beautiful even when played in reverse. The composer was able to create something so mathematically precise, yet still kept all its beauty... I couldn't help wondering how.

audios.title: Mortefi's_Trouble
audios.description: Scientific research is but a tool. It's not magic. People tend to have unrealistic expectations about how research works, and you wouldn't want to be one of them.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: I need an energy source to keep my brain going while I work, and sugar is the most effective choice. Candies always instantly improve my mood without leaving sticky residues on my fingers. Here, allow me to present you the Lemon Bomb, a proud work of mine. Care to have a taste?

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: It's important to take time savoring meals prepared with devotion and care, but never those shoddily manufactured instant foods; consuming them is only a disservice to my chewing muscles.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: There is an abyssal gap between "knowing" and "understanding". I once assumed I knew the suffering of people stricken by Tacet Discords, trapped in dread and hunger... After my departure from the New Federation, I realized how I wasn't even close to "understanding" any of them. Maybe there is still a gap between true understanding and what I know now; still, I must do what I can to remedy the situation, now that I am aware of it. I will create Tacetite weapons that are stronger than ever... and with that, grant humans the power to confront Tacet Discords.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Curious about this lighter? I use it to quell my temper when things get annoying. It's not about the flame that goes up in the instant; it's about the "click" it makes. Sounds nice, doesn't it? Try it yourself.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: I knew a couple of researchers from the New Federation. Their worship of technology was fanatical, and it was exactly this fanaticism that clouded their judgment. They believed technological progress was an end in itself, rather than a means for achieving something else. As creators, we must recognize exactly what we are building, and for what purpose.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday! I spend most of my time working in the lab, but days like this are not ones I'd easily forget. Here, I have made a multi-purpose tactical belt for you. This is the fifty-plus iteration of it, with an illuminator, a thruster, an air inflation module, and more. This should suffice for most situations you may encounter in the wild. If you want other features, come find me and I'll install them for you.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: I still have much experiment data to process...

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: Precision, elegance, and harmony... These are the beautiful parallels between classical music and science.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: With temperance and discipline, my flames will be kept in check.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Mortefi, researcher at Department of Safety, Huaxu Academy. For inquiries about Tacetite weapons, you may visit my lab. Make sure you know what you're talking about, though, before knocking at my door.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: As always, I'm the one you need... I really can't win with you, can I? Let's just get this done.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Make this quick. I have experiments underway.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: Dragging me out of my lab for this...*Yawn* You better have a good reason.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Hmm... Thank you, I appreciate it. From now on, you'll have priority access to me for any deliverables you need.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: My thoughts feel sharper now... Wait, that could be an interesting concept. I should jot it down.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Such mystical power... If applied to Tacetite research, our progress will be remarkable.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Fine, since you've done this much for me... Go ahead, tell me the wildest inventions you can think of, and watch me make them happen for you.

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: It was Jiyan who rescued me from the wilderness and referred me to the Academy, and I've been thankful for that... I have solved a lot of problems for him in return, of course. For example, all the Midnight Rangers currently use a one-piece medical kit of my design.

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: That girl, I think the name is Yangyang. I hear her humming from time to time. Surprisingly, her melodies always bring my mind to peace.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Baizhi and I are almost colleagues, though we don't work in the same department. I've only interacted with her briefly on a few occasions, but I had the chance to read some of her writings. Her paper was well-thought-out and carefully expressed, featuring an intriguing perspective. If I may comment, she is an excellent scholar of Remnant Creatures.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Speaking of Chixia, she's a regular visitor at my lab, often bringing children along. She's a straightforward person, which I like. Besides, those who get along with kids are never bad people. Kids are incredibly perceptive of a person's true character.

audios.title: About_Xiangli_Yao
audios.description: That Xiangli Yao... One day I'll outdo him, and create even better inventions!

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Quit the chit-chat. Tell me what you need and I'll make it for you, provided your descriptions are reasonable.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Come find me when you need something made. Come find me... when you don't, too. Just idling by together, listening to music and indulging in some sweets... I'll be looking forward to that, if you're here with me.

audios.title: Sensor
audios.description: Hmph... Quite good at hiding, aren't you?

audios.title: Thoughts_I
