audios.description: My mind has grown numb with monotony for the past decade or so. I handle exciting jobs sometimes, but the fun soon dries up, like tidal marks on the shoal. But you... you're the only one who keeps me on my toes. So of course I'd be paying attention to you.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: My stance? Ha! I didn't join the Black Shores to save the world. Just needed a way to pass the time on this island. Justice, truth… Saints spout them, sinners exploit them, all for their own gains. Me? I need nothing and want nothing. Pretty words hold no power over me.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Why did you... come here? Told you not to... Cough cough! Not to visit... while I'm here in the pod... Hehe, a cute girl like me needs her privacy, you know? ...I hate myself like this... don't look.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: You know what? I dreamed of you while I was in the medical pod. In that dream… I couldn't get to know you. Your name echoed in my head endlessly as we roamed the same places, but I never saw your face, not even once... How odd...

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Saving the world? Couldn't care less. This cage of a world only consumes and binds you with responsibility. But if you believe it's the right thing to do… Go for it! You're staying true to yourself, and I like that. It's beautiful, we both find joy in our own paths! But if you ever get tired of this whole savior business, do let me know… What will I do? Hehe... Secret!

audios.title: Camellya's_Hobby
audios.description: Napping in the sun on a warm afternoon is so cozy, I just need to find a quiet place. Sleeping in the warmth, nestled among branches and leaves...

audios.title: Camellya's_Trouble
audios.description: Working for the Black Shores has been a snooze fest. I tried to spice it up by picking the toughest jobs, didn't help. There's no one worth my time on Solaris now. I'm dying of boredom!

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Fruit juice. Fresh, raw, and tangy. That gentle sweetness lingers... You want some?

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: I don't like boozy stuff. Why? ...I don't know. It just makes me... uncomfortable.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Pick the best seeds, protect them till they're ripe. Then comes the fun—I'll have worthy opponents to fight! I don't care about the rest. We'll all die one day, might as well dance and live it up while we can. Responsibility? Ideals? Those are just lies we tell ourselves to feel better, nothing but a false high.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: This bracelet was a gift from you. I remember it's meant to monitor my frequency. Then in case I'm in trouble, you can find me. Convenient, right? It's been broken for years now, though...

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: I'm a regular at the medical pod. The docs must be surprised I'm still alive after all these years. Binders are my saving grace—can't handle the pain without them. That's how I made it through alive every time. Don't look at me like that. I see nothing bad about it. Being on death's doorstep taught me to stay true to myself. Betraying life is worse than any lie. You have to embrace yourself to find real joy.

audios.title: About_Encore
audios.description: Encore… Ah, that girl who loves stories! I hope she'll mature into a strong opponent one day, then we'll have so much fun together.

audios.title: About_Shorekeeper
audios.description: She's always so serious, following every rule despite being our de facto leader now. Well, she's taken care of me before on many occassions, so I gotta show some respect... Wait, I've been a Bloom Bearer for years? How time flies...

audios.title: About_Aalto
audios.description: Aalto's a master at mind games. It's hard to get under his skin! He's not strong enough to pique my interest though. That guy relies on trickery too much for my liking.

audios.title: About_Jinhsi
audios.description: The Loong Maiden of Jinzhou reminds me of the Shorekeeper, the way they're oh-so-devoted to their duties, all the self-sacrifice! I don't understand, why must they burden themselves so much?

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: That girl, the Taoist? She's a fun one to watch. She may seem to follow human society's boring norms, but her untamed spirit still shines through every now and then.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Your birthday is the most wonderful day. Without you, my life would be so empty and dull! Being with you again brings me peace. I am content now. Hey, put your Terminal away, great savior of Solaris! I blocked all signals here so we can be undisturbed. Today, you're mine, and no one else's.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Hehe... How do you like this flower?

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Camellya, a Bloom Bearer of the Black Shores. Happy to see you again! My beloved... seed of fate.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Hehe... I'm looking forward to our game.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Where are you, my lovely seeds?

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Ahh... I love it... The power surging through my veins...!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Oops, watch out for my thorns. Don't get your fingers pierced. Hmm... on second thought, not much can harm you anyway.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Hey, care to join me for another round? I'll show you a whole bunch of new tricks and powers, promise!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: ...Ugh! Hah... I-I'm fine, I just... need some time, to ride out the pain... Swallow it whole, make the chaotic frequencies my strength...

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: With this power, I am whole again... Now we can truly play as equals. After all, it's not just what you play... but who you play with. Don't you agree?

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_II
audios.description: Don't run, keep the dance going!

audios.title: Enemies_Near
audios.description: The lovely smell of all my prey...

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Misconceptions about us abound. Violence is just one tool in our arsenal, not our sole means to an end. Cooperation is our usual aim, but in a world of betrayal and deception, we must make sure backstabbing us is never worth the risk. To maintain efficient cooperation, we demand an ironclad contract with consequences... and that's where necessary violence comes in play.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: You're quite good with your sword, but in a world like this, fighting alone will not suffice. Picture this: a single hound may not scare you, but what about a pack? Fear creeps in as you're trapped alone, with no one to guard your back, surrounded by enemies on all fronts. They aren't leaving without blood. Strength comes in numbers... Keep that in mind.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: As a leader, one must excel in the art of deception, projecting an image of unwavering composure and offering false reassurance... Every decision you make could change lives. If a day comes when you are in charge of other people, or even the entire world, what choices will you make? Will you bear the weight of their fate, or prioritize your own desires above all else?

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: You've done your homework on us, it seems. As mercenaries, we take on any job and always deliver... The pay is our only concern. Wherever war and chaos go, the Ghost Hounds will follow. We exist, because there is always demand for our service. How do you perceive us? Though I couldn't care less about others' opinions... I'm open to your thoughts.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Someday, I may need your aid. If my actions steer the Ghost Hounds off course, I'll count on you to right my wrongs... or put an end to my existence. For now, I am happy to enjoy our current alliance.

audios.title: Calcharo's_Hobby
audios.description: Search, rescue, transportation, recon, group combat... Dogs are loyal and skilled in many ways. Me? I don't keep dogs. It's too dangerous... for the dogs, that is.

audios.title: Calcharo's_Trouble
audios.description: Hopefully, my guys aren't stirring up too much trouble back at the base...

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Huanglong's emergency rations. They taste slightly better than those made elsewhere.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: ...Out in the wild, food preferences don't matter. I only care about what's edible.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Humans or Tacet Discords, I'll eradicate any danger to the Ghost Hounds. It is my sole focus to protect my people, and secure any form of momentary respite when I can.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: The deaths of our kind are likely to go unnoticed. It's our destiny—fleeting, like dust in the wind. Each of us bears a dog tag with our name and story etched upon it, as a form of legacy... A symbol of our existence, no less than a declaration of it.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: In the Underworld, it's all about survival of the fittest. Either you dominate as the apex predator, or you're doomed to be devoured by those above you. It's the brutal law of the land. In a world where might makes right, we must rise to the very top to remain free from others' schemes, and preserve our autonomy.

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: He's a capable leader. He once recommended me an ancient tome on the art of war from Huanglong, one that I regret not acquiring sooner—it could have saved me some effort. As for the deal between us... *scoff* It was merely an exchange of interests. Nothing more.

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Pretentious, arrogant, and self-absorbed... That man epitomizes every trait associated with those snooty New Federation nobles. That said, I cannot deny his talent in crafting Tacetite Weapons. I can arrange a meeting with our trusted arms dealer, if he's interested.

audios.title: About_Aalto
audios.description: Need to reach Aalto? Here's his contact. Mention my name for a twenty percent discount.

audios.title: About_Yinlin
audios.description: Yinlin? That undercover agent who infiltrated my group? *huff* Easy there. I didn't give her a hard time, provided she always stayed in her lane.

audios.title: About_Verina
audios.description: I met her once. A prodigy in the field of botany at such a young age... Impressive.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday. Is there anyone or anything bothering you? On this special day, I can offer my services at a discounted price to help rid you of your problems.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Calcharo, leader of the Ghost Hounds Mercenary Group. I suppose you've heard about what we do. Don't worry, your safety as my client will be guaranteed until the job is done.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: You should have the payment ready by now.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Curious you'd want me to join you in person...

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: Let's see if the gains will be worth the effort.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: This power you just gave me... Do you always trust others so easily?

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: ...Your kindness, I have certainly received. Naturally, I'll work for you in return.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Follow our rules and never betray us. As long as I'm alive, the name "Ghost Hounds" should command enough respect to grant you free reign over the continent.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: *amused huff* Impressive, you've got a much bigger ambition than I thought. The offer you made is too enticing to ignore... Very well. I will repay you with my unwavering loyalty.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: I owe you a debt that cannot be easily repaid. The Ghost Hounds have their stance to maintain, and I cannot make decisions for my people lightly. However, I am willing to accept this "contract"... on my own terms. Speak, and your wish will be granted, no questions asked.

audios.title: Liberation_Intro_&_Outro_Skills
audios.description: Let slip the dogs of war!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: The loot we find is not part of my pay. It's all yours.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: I trust you can use it to the full.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Perhaps you haven't noticed, but you seem to always draw in some... rather interesting people. Not sure if it's a blessing or a curse for you, but it certainly makes my job easier... *chuckle* After all, my targets are usually the more peculiar types.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Contrary to what you may believe, many crimes are motivated by love and responsibility. Ironic, isn't it? The two fundamental values of human society can also lead to its downfall. When love becomes all-consuming and responsibility turns into obsession, crimes find fertile ground to thrive.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: I've seen what you're capable of, so I'm not worried about you in a fair fight. That being said, not everyone plays fair. Just watch your back out there... wouldn't want you to get caught off your game.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: The Fractsidus... You've dealt with them before, correct? Though we still don't know their origins or motives, I do know one thing from experience—criminals are most dangerous when we don't understand their intentions. You may run into them again anytime, so stay vigilant.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Being a secret agent means constantly adapting to new identities. When the situation calls for it, I'm ready to shed any of my current personas and slip into a new one. But with you, perhaps I can just be myself, Yinlin... and no one else. It doesn't feel awful... to have someone who knows and remembers me for who I truly am.

audios.title: Yinlin's_Hobby
audios.description: Speaking of the puppet show... It's an old tradition in Huanglong, though not as popular here as in other places. Dollmaker taught me the tricks to help me manipulate my own puppet better. More importantly, it's a useful way to hide in plain sight while performing. I can teach you a move or two, if you're interested.

audios.title: Yinlin's_Trouble
audios.description: Lately, it seems I've been "running into" you a lot lately... Just a heads up, I like to stay under the radar, and being seen with someone as high profile as you tends to attract unwanted attention... *pause, sigh* Not that I don't want to see you, but you'll need to be more subtle than that.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: I've tried many so-called delicacies through my job, but none has left a lasting impression like the plate of Aureate Fried Rice I once had. I believe it's not the fancy ingredients that make a dish truly special, but the skill and care put into its preparation.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Dining with a target requires always catering to their taste. When the food is subpar, I know how to choke it down with a grin. That's why there isn't any dishes I truly dislike... It's not the food that ruins a meal, but the company. With you by my side, I suppose I'd be pleased to eat anything.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: A utopia free of all vices and crimes may sound tempting, but once you think about it, it is nothing more than a naïve dream. That's why we exist—to uncover the hidden and unapproachable darkness that the majority refuse to acknowledge, and do the dirty work in their place.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: This puppet? I call it Zapstring. It used to be a basic puppet made by some novice, but I've revamped it for battle. It hasn't let me down yet, despite its wear and tear.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Members of the Séance Society were lured in by Dollmaker's false promises, but they too must bear responsibility for what had transpired. I can only hope that upon their release, they will break from the illusions of the past... Despite the loss of loved ones, life must continue.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday... What's with that look? Come on, I promise it's really your special day. And no, I'm not playing any games this time. Oh well. I can already tell you have nothing planned, so... Will you let me have you all to myself, for the entire day?

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: No rush. The impatient ones will fall right into our lap.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Name's Yinlin. As for what I do... Shhh, we don't talk about that in public.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Anything you need me to deal with?

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: So we're teaming up? Fine, though I'm more used to fighting alone.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Good. That did make me stronger... Should I start thinking about how to repay you?

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: For us undercover agents, fighting skills are just the bare minimum. The key to success is having an unbreakable will.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: I have finer control over Zapstring now. It's all credit to you.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I will make good use of this power and fight by your side... We'll confront evil, wherever it lies.

audios.title: Dash
audios.description: Good. There's no time to waste.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: I guess you can say Chixia is a younger colleague of mine. She is a natural fit for the Patroller position. With time and experience, she will surely excel in her role.

audios.title: About_Rover
audios.description: Being skilled as a Patroller doesn't necessarily make one suited for undercover work, but curiously enough I see potential in you. Have you considered applying to the Bureau? Just kidding, unless you're interested.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: What's that look on your face? Surprised to see me?

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: This special power you have entrusted me... Should I take it as a sign of trust in my abilities? Or...perhaps a token of affection for me? Either way, I appreciate the gesture. Your straightforwardness is quite endearing.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Size isn't everything, you know. I may not look it, but I've got quite a bit of strength that lets me handle any physical work no problem! If you ever need a hand, just let me know! I'm always happy to help out!

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Curious about these bandages? They're mostly from my liondance rehearsals, and the rest, well, I got them from my battles in the wild. What about the bandages on your wrist, battle scars too? Wish I could have protected you... I'd rather take the hit myself any day over seeing someone hurt.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Words hold incredible power. In Huanglong, we believe spoken words may manifest into reality. Then if even jokes have a chance to come true, why not good wishes and blessings? That's why we should always express our positive thoughts out loud. Who knows, maybe there is a higher power listening and ready to grant our desires. So, I make sure to say my Lucky Greetings to everyone, as often as possible!

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: I wish I could show you my hometown, but it's not the same anymore. It's been turned into a Tacet Field, without any life or joy. I prefer living in vibrant places, where there's energy and excitement. But one day, when we overcome the Lament and bring back the beauty of this land, I'll take you there. You'll see the tallest trees, twinkling fireflies, and a river glittering with stars... Yes, we'll see that day...

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: I'm no longer afraid of letting people see my real appearance, but... I guess I still look rather different, and not everyone is so accepting of that. Sometimes I just want to lend a helping hand, and they'd assume I'm trying to claw at them or something... Erm, what do you think, Rover? Do I look scary to you?

audios.title: Lingyang's_Hobby
audios.description: I love people-watching. It's fascinating to see so many different faces and backgrounds come to watch the liondance. Each person brings their own story and personality... I guess they're just, just like... leaves? I've never come across two identical leaves. Every one of them is unique. And you, Rover, I want to know more about you so bad... Tell me more, please?

audios.title: Lingyang's_Trouble
audios.description: "Feel the drum and dance along," they say. In lion dancing, there isn't really a set melody we dance to. It's all about finding the perfect balance between movement and music. Everyone in our troupe must attend both Mr. Wufang's liondance classes and Mr. Qixing's drumming classes. And let me tell you, I struggle with the drums. Catching the beat is always tricky. I do better in the liondance class, but I often get lost in the dance and forget to keep up with the beat... Luckily, I can still manage to pull off the performance smoothly, thanks to my fellow troupe members. They often tweak the drumbeat tempo to match my rhythm. As my Master likes to point out, I'm a classic case of being "good at some things but not so much at others".

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Medium-rare is the way to go for grilled meat. That tender texture with a hint of secret spices... mmm, delicious! Trust me, I know all about it. Have you tried those "Medium Rare" skewers in Jinzhou? I'm the genius behind them, and now they're all the rage!

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Hmm... you've got a point there. Would grilled veggies taste any better?

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: The liondance tradition is all about banishing evil, guarding fortune, and beckoning blessings. I want to be the best dancer out there to keep this tradition thriving. My Master always reminds me not to aim too high and bite off more than I can chew. I know there's still a long road ahead in perfecting my skills, but as long as I keep moving steadily from one pole to another, like we do in the tournaments, I'll surely reach my goal, no matter how high or far away it may seem.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Why do I keep this liondance head with me? Well, when I first got to Jinzhou, I was afraid to take it off. I didn't want people to see that I looked different from everyone else. Wearing the head made me feel safe, like I could hide my appearance and just focus on dancing. Maybe back then, I thought that only by wearing the liondance head could I truly be myself without judgement.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: For some reason, people seem obsessed with my tail. Sometimes my seniors like to play their little drums to the beat of my swishing tail. But honestly, I have no idea how to control it. It's more like some kind of... reflex? When I feel happy—like right now, it just starts wagging on its own.

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: In Jinzhou, the liondance tradition started as a way to celebrate victories in battle. And nowadays, we always perform before our soldiers go into battle—it's like a good luck charm and morale booster. Our Liondance Troupe has been traveling between military camps in various regions to deliver performances. I'll never forget my first time leading a pre-battle show. I was nervous and messed up here and there, but General Jiyan didn't get mad at me. He actually encouraged me a lot. He isn't as strict as he seems in public, is he? No wonder the soldiers admire him so much... He's really a strong and kind person.

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: Liondance is a fusion of martial arts and dance. It originated from traditional boxing and martial arts in Huanglong, emphasizing swift footwork and powerful postures. Miss Jianxin practices Fengyiquan, a contrasting style to liondance, but just as impressive. I once saw her effortlessly take down seven men with a single punch! The Fengyiquan truly lives up to its reputation: conquering the unyielding with the yielding.

audios.title: About_Taoqi
audios.description: The Qixing Drum's sound echoes far and wide, and people say it scares evil spirits and beasts away. I never thought anyone could sleep through that loud banging, but then I met this pink-haired lady called Taoqi... Turns out she's the Chief Officer of border defense at the Ministry of Development. With all the defenses in Jinzhou, I'd be tired too... Maybe she is just too exhausted from work? I hope she can catch some good rest.

audios.title: About_Yuanwu
audios.description: Uncle Yuanwu keeps lots of street cats at his boxing gym. I often bring them fish I've caught as thank-yous for, let's say, helping me practice. I wonder if those cats are picking up on his moves? Maybe I can draw some inspiration from that. By the way, Uncle Yuanwu's dried fish is super delicious!

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Don't let Mr. Mortefi's permanent 'Do-Not-Disturb' face fool you, he's actually a big kid at heart. He's the genius behind all those fun toys for Jinzhou's children, and he even created some sick merch for our Liondance Troupe! So when you need his help, don't hesitate to tell him—just do it politely and he'll surely lend you a hand!

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Chixia? Aha, you mean my top rival! I won't let her outshine me again... And why is that, you ask? Well, we're battling to see who can help more people!

audios.title: About_Yangyang
audios.description: I love Yangyang's singing! I've been trying to convince her to sing at our theater, but she keeps turning me down.... Says she's embarrassed to sing in front of a crowd. I don't get it! It's just like liondancing—once you take that first step, the rest falls into place!

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: The Remnant Creature that hangs around Baizhi... It's called You'Tan, right? I once thought it was my kind. Aw. I wish it really was...

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday! May your life be filled with joy and delight, as you chase your dreams and reach new heights. May happiness follow wherever you go, may your journey be a wonderful show! Hehe, I've come up with a special liondance just for you! Can you spend some more time here with me today? Because, well, this dance might run a little long.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Awoo—Lion up! Victory is mine at this year's Greens-plucking Tournament!

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: Hmm? Did I just hear something? It feels off to not hear the drums...

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Hiya, I'm Lingyang. You're probably more used to seeing me as that liondancer on the high poles, I guess? Let's hang out more! I want you to remember what I look like, without the liondance head!

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Opening greeting—Foul spirits begone, all safe and sound!

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Hmm? Where are you going? Count me in!

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Shh... I sneaked myself out. Promise you won't tell, okay?

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: Here's to a safe journey ahead.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Great! That's a new move for me!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: No more slacking off now that you're here to help! I should practice harder.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: So this is what they mean by "Beyond the mountain lies a broader world"... Thank you, Rover! I couldn't have made it this far without you. Now I'm ready to challenge higher Plum Blossom Poles.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: My Master once told me this: Never lose reverence for the "highest pole", no matter how much you've achieved. There's always someone better, and always more to learn, so we should always stay humble. I'll keep cultivating myself with this reverence in mind. Besides, there's someone right in front of me that I want to catch up to.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Legend has it that the liondance was created by ancient sages, inspired by the movement of constellations in the sky. True mastery of it allows one to draw power from the world, to form a miniature cosmos within. ...Now I think I've finally caught a glimpse into that realm. I've still got a long way ahead, but at least I can better protect you now.

audios.title: Normal_Attack_VI
audios.description: Beat the drum. Ready to prance!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: There's no stopping good luck once it's on your side!

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Hello there. What will it be for today? Are you here to put in some extra work, or maybe just to loosen up a bit? Of couse, you're welcome for a chat, too. One moment, I'll go make some tea for you.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Exercising is essential for us martial artists. Other people may not find the same importance in exercise, since everyone has their own unique strengths. After all, we no longer live in a time where brute force is the only solution. Or rather, brute force never really solved anything.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Rumors have been circulating about me, and I don't intend to stop them. My story isn't particularly exciting, but people find amusement in talking about it, that doesn't bother me. And with words about me getting out there, I might end up reeling in a few dunderheads. Whatever impression others may have of me, I trust your judgment will not be swayed. Or, if I may say so, I am happy to accept whatever you think of me.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: I did hurt people in the past, sometimes with my hands, and sometimes through other means. Back then, I had to take the initiative... to make sure no more innocent people would fall prey to them. I had experience handling such things, and that was why I felt obligated to help. But I'm not telling you this in response to the rumors. I believe friendship is built on mutual understanding, and now is a good time for you to get to know me better.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: When it comes to the business world, one is often told that it's impossible to find true friendship. I have to concede, nobody I've ever known has understood me as well as you do. Though my gym has many customers, you are the only one to have become a true friend of mine. You are, and will always be welcome at my gym, my friend.

audios.title: Yuanwu's_Hobby
audios.description: A steaming cup of tea makes an excellent remedy for sore muscles after an intense workout. It's quite effective, you should give it a try.

audios.title: Yuanwu's_Trouble
audios.description: Nestled between the borders, Jinzhou is subject to ever-changing weather. Sustaining the dried fish I've been making for Mimi has been a difficult task... Hmm, I suppose a solution will come to me in due time.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: The solid ingredients of Jinzhou Stew blend effortlessly to form a simple dish. Back in the days when I had to live far away from home, it was the only dish that I could recreate to make me feel close to my roots. I can never have enough of it.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: I'm not a big fan of foods that are hard to chew… Oh, it's got nothing to do with my teeth. I'm just not fond of the prickling sensation of stickiness in my mouth.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Well... I just want to maintain the stability I currently enjoy, and maybe keep my hometown safe, if I get the luxury to, haha.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Have I been keeping some kind of secret healthy drink in this flask, you ask? *chuckle* It's really just regular hot tea.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: The stiffest tree is often broken by the harshest of winds, whereas the bamboo and willow survive by bending along. Finding harmony between strength and adaptability is integral to lasting success, be it in martial arts, commerce, or all aspects of life.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: You're always tied up with affairs, how about relaxing a bit for a change on your birthday? Here, I got you an ordermade messager, some Angelica Tea leaves, and a personalized health management planner for the upcoming year. You really should prioritize your health. Self-care comes before anything else, including helping other people, my friend.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Oh? *chuckles*... Did you smell the dried fish I have?

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: Please don't worry. I've got it in check.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Hello. I am Yuanwu, and I run a boxing gym. It's not a big place, but we make sure every customer is treated with finesse. You're welcome to visit any time.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Anything I can help you with?

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: It's nice to take a break once in a while.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: I haven't felt this tingling sensation swimming across my veins in a while... So this is all your doing? *chuckle* Looks like this is going to take some time getting used to.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Now that I've gotten used to it, this power feels robust and flexible. It does have something in common with my Leihuangquan.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Thanks to your help, my skills have improved and even my thunderbolts are stronger. Owing to your aid, I might be able to get a couple more scoundrels dealt with.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I can't thank you enough. With such power, I feel young and back to my prime days again. They say that time is invaluable. Doesn't that make the gift of power you've bestowed on me priceless? *chuckle*... Now, if you'd allow me some time, I should come up with a way to repay the favor.

audios.title: About_Lingyang
audios.description: Lingyang often visits my gym to play with Mimi just outside the front doors, always carrying a couple of fresh tetras as treats. I guess it might be his thank-you to Mimi for all the agility training they had done together. He sure is a thoughtful young man.

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: I am more than happy to get an outstanding training partner like Jianxin by merely offering her a simple meal... Of course, I'm always pleased to spend time with her over a meal, whether she's here to train with me or not.

audios.title: About_Danjin
audios.description: I can sense a dangerous aura from Danjin's way of fighting... I'm worried that she may have far too much burden on her shoulders at such a young age.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Every morning, when I opened the gym, Chixia was already patrolling the street with exuberant energy. *chuckle*... I must keep up with my exercises too. Can't be outdone by the younger generations.

audios.title: About_Rover
audios.description: Your poise and comfidence are impressive. Such remarkable character can't possibly be built overnight. I can tell you've experienced far more than I have.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Whether you need help with working out or maintaining your health, feel free to come by my gym. We welcome all visitors.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Since you've gifted me such a precious treasure, I should give you a matching gift in return. Please, take this Tea Pet—it grants you free access to all the boxing gyms and teahouses in Huanglong. And... if you ever need me, just hand it to any one of the shopkeepers. I will come to your aid as soon as possible, no matter what.

audios.title: Sensor
audios.description: Nice. Let's go check it out.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: Found what you're looking for? Good.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: You're a seasoned fighter, I can tell. Let's have a bout sometime soon, shall we? Sparring is my passion, and I can't pass up an opportunity to fight someone like you!

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Erm, actually... I wonder just how you seem to know so much. I've been to the cities a few times, but I know very little compared to you. Can I ask you for help next time I run into things I don't understand? Please bear with me, though, as it may take me some time to catch on...

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: I grew up in my sect, on a remote, secluded mountain. Most people may find it a bit challenging to make it there, but it should be easy for you. I can take you there if you want. Hehe, honestly, I've always wanted to bring you home as my guest!

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: I wasn't the brightest kid, but I was lucky to find my talent in martial arts. That's why I really admire people with both brains and courage. Of all the smart people I know, you're the best, being a great martial artist and a true defender of justice. You are the one I look up to the most, beside my masters.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: I adore being part of nature's harmony. Every songbird in the sky, every leaf on the ground, and every glimmer of sunlight makes me feel a serene joy, as the sweet breezes surround me, whispering life's many blessings. Your presence brings me the same kind of feeling, Rover. With you, everything feels so right, like I belong where I should.

audios.title: Jianxin's_Hobby
audios.description: My life's goal is to one day fully master Fengyiquan. For me, every place—be it in the valley, on a mountain peak, or a bustling market—provides an opportunity to perfect my art. I find joy in connecting with various energies and Chi available across different places; this connection gives me new chances of growth.

audios.title: Jianxin's_Trouble
audios.description: Worthy opponents are always hard to find. I always yearn for a good fight from which I can learn and improve myself. That said, I'm not too invested in looking for challenges anymore. One can only find inner peace when they let go of their desires. I can find my growth without engaging in frequent battles.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: My favorite food? It's the Guokui Flatbread! We'd always have it at our sect, and when I was little, I got extra servings like other younger disciples. Master Shiling even said that I'd followed his scent of freshly made flatbread all the way up the mountain, and that's how I joined our sect. I'm not sure if it was true or not though, he loves to rib us like that sometimes.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: There isn't any particular food that I dislike. I'm not much of a food person, I guess. People mix various ingredients for a variety of purposes—to gain muscle, to treat illnesses, or to stay healthy. The flavors of these food combinations are just natural outcomes. All types of food serve a purpose and can be beneficial.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Unite the strengths that are both seen and unseen, and purge oneself of all that is unclean. Only then may one know the Tao's grandness; it is the final test every true Taoist must take.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: I got the Mirrors of Clarity from Master Shiling when I was little. The mirrors represented my masters' good wishes for me: to stay dedicated, disciplined, and become a well-rounded individual. Each day, I carry them with me to honor their teachings, but more importantly, to remind myself of how much they cared for me.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: To reach where our sect is, one must take the Ancient Path—it's the only way up the mountain. This is usually difficult for new disciples, but Master Shiling said when he took me in, I almost made it up the mountain as fast as he did. He said I was like a little wild animal: agile, vibrant, and naive. I can't remember any of that, though. The earliest memory I have is practicing martial arts with fellow disciples.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Chixia always invites me to spar. She's really good with her guns, and I've learned so much from those fights. I admire her dedication and genuineness. It's great to have made a friend while honing my fighting skills.

audios.title: About_Yuanwu
audios.description: Occasionally I'd leave my sect to go on what we call self-cultivating trips. During one of those trips, I visited Mr. Yuanwu's boxing gym and challenged him to fight, and I won. I told Master Shiling about it when I returned, and it turns out Mr. Yuanwu's ancestors used to practice martial arts at our sect. According to the rules, I guess I should call him my "martial senior". I heard that Mr. Yuanwu went through a lot when he was younger, but it seems he doesn't want me to talk too much about it, so let's just drop it there.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: I've only celebrated birthdays for my masters and fellow disciples before, and we'd usually make peach buns of longevity for the birthday person. So... here, I've made some peach buns for you! Happy Birthday! I wish you good health and great happiness!

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: What am I supposed to do with this... Hmm... W-whoah! Phew...

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I am Jianxin, the successor of Fengyiquan. Thank you for your hospitality. Would you mind sparring with me?

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Release the wants, and the mind quiets. Cleanse the thoughts, and the soul clears.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: What will I learn from this fight?

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: This is a different practice, but it feels similar to how I usually do seated cultivation as my master taught. Hmm... how do I put this? I'll tell you once I've come up with a better way to describe.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Finally, I've fully mastered this move. It all went so well today. Thank you for sparring with me!

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: This is... the feeling of standing on top of a mountain, watching the billowing sea of clouds beneath my feet. The spirit within me resonates with every life in this universe... Yes, that's it! That's how it feels! I've finally figured out how to put this feeling into words!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Now my body and mind have gained a newfound clarity, and even my senses are keener than before. The Chi that surrounds me seems more... Oh no! Sorry! Are you alright? Phew... I should have paid more attention to keep it in check. I'll focus on improving my control of this power from now on. Thank you, Rover! I'm now another step closer to my goal!

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Is this real? I can't believe... Thank you, for everything you've done for me. No one, apart from my masters, has shown me more kindness in this life than you have. I can never repay in full what I owe to you, but I want to try anyway. There is something I've wanted to tell you for a while now: beyond seeking martial excellence, I've found another goal in life—to do everything I can for you, until my very last breath.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: A contented mind is a perpetual feast.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: Hmm. What's it gonna be this time?

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Welcome to Jinzhou, esteemed guest from afar. My apologies for any shortcomings in my hospitality; my schedule is quite full. If there is a matter requiring my attention, please do not hesitate to find me at City Hall.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: The bustling city of Jinzhou is a product of every blooming flower, sturdy brickwork, and occupied home. With every new visitor, the city gains new life. Among them, you are truly one of a kind... No, I am not simply repeating what our Sentinel has said. These words come from my heart as well.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: An old proverb states, "When a great mind emerges, even the sea will part and the mountains will tremble." It speaks to the transformative power of extraordinary individuals... With your presence in Jinzhou, I believe great changes will come in due time.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: I used to be quite curious about your background. However, I've come to realize that one's actions hold more weight than their past. Your past may shape you, but it is your present deeds that truly define you. Having witnessed everything you have done for Jinzhou, I cannot help but notice the mysterious connections between them... Perhaps there is something deeper behind your arrival in Jinzhou.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description:
Walking alone may lead to a faster pace, but a group can cover greater distances. 
Moving forward, I will stand by my companions… and I will stand by you as we face whatever the future holds, together.

audios.title: Jinhsi's_Hobby
audios.description: Have you been to the Jinzhou Theater? It's a place of endless joy and laughter, especially when a show concludes on a happy note. I've always cherished that sight, which is why I want to ensure everyone finds their own happy ending.

audios.title: Jinhsi's_Trouble
audios.description: Hmm... When faced with challenges, I am driven by a sense of purpose to find solutions instead of succumbing to worry. The feeling of worry or frustration rarely crosses my mind nowadays.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: If you haven't yet, I highly recommend visiting Jinzhou's morning market. The breakfast stall vendor sells the most delicious Loong Buns topped with plump red dates. As they steam, their sweet aroma envelops the air. They are truly a delight.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Jinzhou once suffered from severe food shortages because of the Lament crisis. As someone who lived through that difficult time, I've learned to understand that food is not something to be taken lightly. Every morsel is a gift from Mother Nature as are those who work tirelessly to cultivate it... Personally, I have no dislikes when it comes to food, except for wasteful extravagance or exorbitant prices.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: People prayed to the Sentinel not out of weakness, but because they had no other recourse. As leader, I will guide my people towards a future where humanity takes control of our own destiny.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: As a child, I had vivid dreams, some of them turning into nightmares. I would find myself lost at sea, fighting against the crashing waves and tangled seaweed. But each time, I managed to hold onto a piece of driftwood and make it back to shore. And when I woke up, I would find something in my hand… Yes, it was this shiny piece of scale.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: The snows of Mt. Firmament... I still vaguely remember how the snowflakes there danced in their own whimsical ways. One moment they were hovering in the air, and the next moment they flew upwards into the sky, twirling around the tree branches... Before long, everything was coated in a shimmering blanket of white. In Jinzhou, the snow brings a sense of peaceful togetherness. Strangers become friends as they brush off each other's shoulders and build snowmen together... Whether the snow is light or heavy, I pray to always protect these precious moments of pure tranquility.

audios.title: About_Changli
audios.description: Over the years, my esteemed teacher Changli has taught me much… Yet her smiling eyes still hold mysteries that I cannot yet comprehend.

audios.title: About_Sanhua
audios.description: Amidst my busy days, meals can easily slip my mind. Before I knew it, it would be well past the time for another meal. But like a blessing, Sanhua would always appear with a plate of delicious Loong Buns, filled with exactly what I was craving. I am in awe… How does she know every time?

audios.title: About_Taoqi
audios.description: Taoqi is able to breeze through mountains of workload with ease, despite her frequent yawns. Her efficiency is truly remarkable.

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: "Qingloong rise, monsters gone"... Every child in Jinzhou knows this nursery rhyme by heart. My faith rests with Jiyan, for with his protection the Tacet Discords will never breach our borders.

audios.title: About_Rover
audios.description: I can feel it in my heart that we both have something we'll fiercely defend, a cause worth fighting for... And we won't back down, no matter what it takes.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: After much contemplation, I have decided that a handmade gift will better express my feelings than any expensive store-bought present. Every day since learning of your birthday, I have devoted time to crafting a Loong lantern from materials I've handpicked. Fortunately, I've finished it in time. If you could find time in your busy schedule, please join me at the City Hall to fly this lantern together. It is a beloved tradition in Jinzhou to make a wish upon a soaring lantern on one's birthday, and it is said that the Sentinel will bestow blessings for the year ahead.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: May I pray for anything specific for you? It would be my honor… I'm sure your wishes will come true.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I am Jinhsi, the Magistrate of Jinzhou. My role holds great power and duty. I vow to serve my people with diligence and bring prosperity to our land.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: As the Sentinel foretold, you and I were meant to cross paths.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: No one is born good at anything. As the Magistrate of Jinzhou, I must constantly learn and improve.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: As the new Magistrate, I initially worried about my lack of ability to protect my people. But soon, I realized that dwelling on self-doubt only hindered my progress, so I trained harder. With each session, my strengths grew. It is an honor to serve and defend my people. I'll always strive to improve as their Magistrate.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Thank you for your guidance. I have seen growth in my strength and leadership abilities, and it seems you have taught me more than just swordsmanship; you've taught me valuable life lessons.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I am aware that I have rather peculiar frequencies. It is rare for me to encounter someone whose vibrations align with mine so perfectly... Could it be that you also share a mysterious connection with our Sentinel? I do hope so, as that would make me feel… even closer to you.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: As I get to know you better, I can't help but notice the similarities between us. Our frequencies, powers, and even purposes seem to align. Defending Jinzhou is my duty, and now I sense a deep connection between you and this land… I once believed that mankind should control our own destiny, but my meeting with you has shown me the power of fate. I am grateful for its hand in bringing you into my life.

audios.title: Fallen_I
audios.description: There is... much to be done...

audios.title: Glider_I
audios.description: As far as the eye can see.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: The lands of Jinzhou are filled with riches.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Would these be enough for your needs? Tell me if there is anything else you want.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: I first heard about you when my colleagues were discussing your physical. I was caught up in technical support back then, but wanted to meet you in person. Now, I am content to see that, as I predicted... you have the potential to shape Solaris-3's future in unforeseen ways.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: As the child of two scholars, I was always drawn to the same path. Perhaps trying to follow in their footsteps. However, my recollections of them have blurred over time. Most of what I know about my parents comes from reading their published research and evaluations of their work by others, rather than personal memories. Their existence feels elusive to me, like a hazy dream. Yet, I am their legacy—a reflection of their brilliance, and... their madness.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: I like interacting with people, be it my colleagues at the Academy, or others. At times, I fear losing sight of my own humanity while chasing truth's elusive grasp... In those moments, I step away and seek solace in a bustling crowd. The laughter on their faces reminds me of the warmth of human connection.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Losing my arm didn't bring as much pain as I expected. I was too consumed with excitement, finally discovering the Court of Savantae Ruins, following in my father's footsteps. The achievements I witnessed were beyond imagination. The secrets of a hidden civilization were revealed to me, their inventions harnessing the universe's echoes.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: ...Ah, it's you. Please, come in. No need to worry, I just need to recharge after all those meetings. Like a machine needing a break. Hmm? So you would like to help? Sure, please sit here. Just... stay next to me for a while. You don't need to say anything. Yes, this will do. Thank you.

audios.title: Xiangli_Yao's_Hobby
audios.description: Writing a report alone, after completing research, is satisfying. My scattered thoughts and inspirations come together during this time, becoming clear and organized.

audios.title: Xiangli_Yao's_Trouble
audios.description: During back-to-back academic conferences, my focus wanes and I need time to recharge. Being with peers is enjoyable, but a little solitude is necessary for me to stay sharp.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: I love all breakfast foods. I prefer to sleep and wake up early instead of staying up late and consuming caffeine. Eating consistent breakfast portions energizes my mind quickly.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Oh, the Sour Soy Milk… When I was a toddler, my mother once convinced me to try it. While most of my childhood memories are joyful, that particular taste was overwhelming for my young palate.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: The laws of nature on Solaris have shifted under the Lament's sway, and even fundamental principles are now being questioned across all academic fields. Yet, I find the pursuit of new theories quite stimulating. Deep within the cosmos, beyond the stars, lies a vast expanse waiting to be understood. And there, amidst the barren landscape, truth awaits its discovery.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: This prosthetic arm is pretty handy, loaded with helpful features. I don't have to worry about any arm injury while working on risky experiments, and I can even pull a few pranks on my colleagues. Oh, you want examples? Well... I'll definitely show you when I get the chance.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Among the friends I made when I was a kid, Pascar was the one who kept in touch with me for the longest time. Certain actions, when done too late, can lead to lingering regrets. Occasionally, I contemplate how each individual is a complex enigma, similar to the countless scientific theses I have studied.

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Mortefi is an interesting person. He's devoted to his work with unwavering determination. It's that kind of intense drive that pushes scientists towards brilliant discoveries. I know he considers me a "genius"—but in a workplace with only "geniuses", many ideas will never be realized. My dear friend has yet to grasp his true potential.

audios.title: About_Jinhsi
audios.description: Magistrate Jinhsi has been paying close attention to the battles against Tacet Discords. She often visits the Academy to learn about our latest progress in weapons development. During those visits, she always seems tense. I understand the pressure and weight she carries, with all the promises and expectations placed on her shoulders...

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: The Midnight Rangers bring valuable insights on Tacet Discords from their years of combat experience. General Jiyan has shared his extensive knowledge and new ideas with us. He possesses a gentle and just nature, but what truly sets him apart is his composure. This is essential for someone in his position.

audios.title: About_Aalto
audios.description: Aalto once approached me with an offer from the Black Shores, but I declined. Life at the Academy suits me well. Though his manner may seem unserious, Aalto has a sharp eye for valuable information and connections for rare materials. I've frequently relied on his services.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
audios.description: Baizhi is a great researcher. Our work doesn't often overlap, but I've read her reports and they're well-informed and persuasive. She often participates in field research, earning her a reputation among peers for bringing back valuable data.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday. Please, extend your hand. With the Lament crisis stalling our deep space exploration, our understanding of the galaxy has been limited. But this... See? This is a glimpse of the unchanging universe, brimming with secrets and tranquility, just for you. If my theories about your true place of origin are correct... I hope this memento offers some solace.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: My name is Xiangli Yao, a researcher at the Huaxu Academy. Rover, your rare resonance frequencies raise an intriguing question: are you a unique beacon of insight in our quest for truth? Or do you already hold the ultimate truth in your hand?

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: As truthseekers, we gauge the universe from within a nutshell. I'd love to hear your insights.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Amidst disruptions, let's find our way to the right path.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: Science is life's questioning of truth.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: An interesting new perspective. Thank you. Now I should be able to further improve my prosthetic arm's energy output.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: I can now achieve even greater things with Metalmorph. Is there a particular thing you desire? Please let me offer my new creation as a gift. It wouldn't exist without you.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: It's interesting. Your feedback reminds me of the texts I found in the Court of Savantae Ruins. Their ideology is fascinating and enigmatic, almost as if it came from the stars in outer space.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I'm headed to test the new combat techniques I've learned. Care to join me? It's time to put theory into practice. I believe I have reached a critical point, and overcoming it will bring a new horizon.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: The pursuit of truth is a rocky path to tread. Some stumble and push forward, others lament their weariness, and a few may even turn back. Our ranks thin as we near the ultimate goal. But Rover... Though you blaze your own trail, I know you are always with us, guiding the truthseekers forward.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: Hmm... That was a rudimentary lock.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Does anything here catch your interest?

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Ah, look who we have here. A rare visitor. Luckily, I've finished my work for today. Would you like to join me in a game of Weiqi, if you're not in a rush to leave?

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: I seem to know a lot about your past, you say? *a small chuckle* Not really. I'd say you may have left those clues for your present self long ago, and I just happened to come across them while going through historical records. I am honored to guide you through the connections between your past and present.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: A strategist's mind is a vast and complex entity, much like the ocean. Its placid exterior may mask the turbulent currents of thought swirling within. Master once warned me to be wary of those who stay quiet in times of uncertainty. Yet with you, I find solace in the quiet moments, in our unspoken connection.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Master Xuanmiao taught me the ways of the sword, but he left this world before I could fully absorb his teachings. I have since tried my best to understand his notes and continue my training on my own. When I first saw you wield your sword, it struck a chord with me, and now I understand why. It's not that you resemble my late master in your skills, but rather that he learned from you.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: I found you and brought you out of that Sonoro Sphere. This is proof I am qualified to stand by your side and assist in achieving our shared goal. It takes great courage and wisdom to willingly enter into a situation full of unknowns, and I trust that you will achieve your desired outcome. My knowledge and power are at your disposal, always ready to help you in any way needed.

audios.title: Changli's_Hobby
audios.description: The dynamics of a Weiqi game mirror the complexities of our world, always in a state of constant flux and transformation... Fascinating, isn't it?

audios.title: Changli's_Trouble
audios.description: My body temperature is higher than usual because of my Flame-controlling Forte. It doesn't hinder daily tasks, but it does have its quirky consequences. Jinhsi's iced pastries and Sanhua's delicate snow birds always melt faster than I'd prefer in my hands... Sigh.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Each delicacy is unique in its own right. It's difficult to choose just one, but if I must, there was a meal I received as a hungry child, a kind gesture that left an indelible memory. That taste remains with me to this day.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description:
What food do I dislike? It's not something that crosses my mind often. 
Having traveled through barren lands where people suffer from starvation, I have learned to appreciate every bit of nourishment. 
Plus, there are endless culinary delights beyond the borders of Jinzhou. 
Even if I spent years exploring, I doubt I could taste them all.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: I have always dreamed of a world filled with peace and prosperity. Though I may not live to see it myself, I will do everything in my power to support those who continue to work towards that future. And when that day finally arrives, if you ever find yourself back in Jinzhou, please take a moment to leave a cup of tea for me at my resting place.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description:
The feather I gave you before? Well, it was forged from the fires of my heart. There are only two of them. 
As long as you hold onto that feather, my fire will never harm you. In fact, I can use it to track your whereabouts if you wish. However, if it ever falls into our enemies' hands... hehe.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Why did I quit my job in the capital and request a transfer to Jinzhou? It's quite simple, really. After the Battle Beneath the Crescent, there was no Magistrate in Jinzhou and the central government couldn't just sit by and let chaos reign. Also, my master had a strong connection to Mt. Firmament. He told me it would be the very place where I would find the one I needed to look for. I didn't quite understand his intentions then, but now... well, as they say, fate works in mysterious ways.

audios.title: About_Jinhsi
audios.description: Jinhsi is a bright and diligent soul. With time, she will undoubtedly blossom into a capable Magistrate. She has always been dedicated to her work, perhaps too much so. She simply needs some time to find balance and fully embrace who she truly is. I am entrusting her care to you, Rover.

audios.title: About_Jiyan
audios.description: Upon my initial arrival in Jinzhou, I was tasked with handling paperwork at the City Hall for a temporary period. Despite sifting through countless documents and files, never once did I come across any issues regarding our border defenses. During the time when Jinzhou was lacking a Magistrate, General Jiyan's unwavering efforts were essential in protecting the welfare of our people.

audios.title: About_Sanhua
audios.description: Sanhua is always composed and silent. As a bodyguard, she remains vigilant and alert at all times. But both Jinhsi and I have always wished for her to take a well-deserved rest and let others help shoulder the burden.

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: Although we followed different sects of Taoist teachings, I found commonalities with her. Her pure and open mind is quite rare nowadays. I believe her perception of the world must be as clear as her eyes. I first met her at the tea house; back then, she seemed to have sensed something about my condition, and served me a bowl of Lotus Seed Soup. That was a delightful surprise.

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Chixia is a vibrant girl, radiating warmth and enthusiasm like a shining flame. She graciously showed me around Jinzhou, introducing me to all the local gems and delectable delicacies. Ah, yes, now I remember... The Spicy Pulled Chicken may seem intimidating to many, but it's just the right amount of spice for me.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday, my dear. When I was younger, I traveled to many places and saw diverse customs for celebrating birthdays, each one unique and fascinating. Here are some gift boxes for you, a small token of my affection. May you find peace and happiness in the years ahead, like the constant moon and rising sun. Oh, these may be too much? Hehe… Consider them extra gifts for your future birthdays. And if I'm still around to see them, I'll find you something different.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: The moment at hand... This very moment is the best of our lives.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I am Changli, Counselor to the Jinzhou Magistrate. Pleased to make your acquaintance, Rover. We meet at last. Should you ever need any assistance in Jinzhou, please let me know.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description:
Eons of time on this vast land, all encapsulated in a humble game... 
I am fortunate to have you as my opponent.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Time to start a new game.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Plan with convention, then conquer by ingenuity.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: Who will be sitting on the other side of the board this time?

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: The sword has no set form, it adapts along with its foes... Likewise, strategies must shift against different opponents.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Oh? This feeling of power coursing through my veins... It feels different from before. Please, do spar with me for another round.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: After my master's passing, I spent years studying martial arts and other subjects through… various unconventional methods. This resulted in some rather comical situations, where angry bookshop owners chased me around. But now, I have the luxury of having you teach me everything without any expectations in return. It's something my younger self could only dream of.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I never thought I could further refine my abilities. Your guidance has been invaluable, and I ought to help you in some way in return. So… Anything I can do for you?

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: You've taught me more than words can express... I believed I had come to terms with my death; never thought I could one day catch a glimpse into the perspective of an eternal being. For this, I am grateful. As long as my flames still burn, I will stay by your side, dear Rover.

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_III
audios.description: Who is the caged bird now?

audios.title: Injured_II
audios.description: No need to dwell on it.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: So many paintings... Ah, not that I'm complaining about the commissions! It's just, I keep finding new things that inspire me... Oh, sorry. What I wanted to say is, the sunlight on you right now is so beautiful. Can I... paint you?

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: I-I saved half of a lemon cake for you. Want to try it? I couldn't help myself and bought it with some of the money I saved up, as a celebration for finishing my commission. I've wanted it for so long! It's sweet but not too rich, with perfect layers. It tastes just as amazing as I imagined!

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: You mean those phantasms? They're just illusions. They might look vibrant and stunning, but... they're not real. I prefer a flawed reality over a perfect illusion. Even though it's tough and unpredictable, it also has its surprises, like... meeting you.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Do you ever feel lonely when you're alone? I do enjoy my own company, but after a while, I start wishing I had someone to talk to. But... whenever I try, I never know what to say and I'm afraid of saying the wrong thing, so it usually ends up awkward... But talking to you feels different. It's like a conversation I used to only dream about. I really wish we could talk like this... forever.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: You know, I started a portrait of you a while ago, but I haven't finished it yet… I feel like I can't capture everything I feel for you on just one piece of paper. If it's alright, I'd like to show it gradually, through what I do and say.

audios.title: Zhezhi's_Trouble
audios.description: My family's debt… It'll probably take me my whole life to pay it off by myself…

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: I have a sweet tooth. Sweet things always give me more energy!

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: When I cook, it feels like the flavors never blend, like the ingredients and seasonings are at odds… Are-are you interested in tasting it? Um, I'll have to practice more before you try it…

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: I hope… that one day, I can spend all my time painting what I truly want, leaving a piece of the real me in this world.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: This brush is called Miaohua. It reacts to phantasms. When I was younger, I had trouble controlling my ability, and sometimes I couldn't tell reality from illusion… The worst time, I was trapped in an illusion for two whole days without realizing it. It was Miaohua's reaction that made me realize everything around me was fake and helped me find my way back to reality.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: If your living space feels cramped, try using furniture in a single color. If prices seem unfair, try going right before the shop closes to find a good deal... I've realized that since I can't change everything, changing my perspective can really help... it's helped me find little bits of happiness in life!

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: Before I came to Jinzhou, I once met her training in the mountains. She had journeyed far and wide, sharing tales of the incredible places she'd been. Her views on nature completely changed how I paint. That deep focus she had while training... I aim for that same focus in my own art.

audios.title: About_Verina
audios.description: I often run into her when I'm out painting. I'm curious about the habits of plants, and she's really into what they mean in Huanglong culture. So we end up spending a lot of time just squatting by some plant, chatting.

audios.title: About_Youhu
audios.description: She's got a real knack for appraising antiques, and knows all about where the rare old paintings are kept. If she hadn't told me where to find those friendly collectors, I'd never have gotten to see the originals with my own eyes. Though she's never told me how she gets her info, I can tell it's not easy. So now and then, I slip some money into her pocket when she's not looking!

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Oh! She once invited me to dinner, and I said yes. However, when I arrived at the restaurant, it turned out to be a large gathering with dozens of people… I was quite nervous, but she was super nice, always making sure I was okay. Thanks to that, I actually met a lot of new people... and some of them even became my clients later on.

audios.title: About_Lingyang
audios.description: His lion dancing... it's really something. So precise and yet so full of life. I once walked by a lion dance performance and tried to sketch it quickly, but the movements kept changing... My pencil couldn't keep up. So, I ended up going to the theater a few more times just to watch. Before I knew it, I actually started enjoying the lion dances quite a bit.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: It's your birthday today. I-I know there will be many people celebrating and giving you gifts, so... I'm not sure what to get that won't be repetitive… How-how about you tell me what you want? Anything you want, I can find it, or any place you wanna go, I'll come along. If you haven't decided yet, that's okay too! My offer will never expire. Really, anytime you need something, just ask and I'll do my best. Oops, sorry, I-I'm rambling... I meant to say, happy birthday!

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Hmm… what should I paint… Oh…

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I'm Zhezhi… I do commissioned paintings. Um, what else...? Oh, I'm open for commissions! I offer fair prices, can adapt to any style you need, and do revisions too. And I never miss a deadline!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Now I've got the energy to work on my commissions.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Your trust… means so much to me!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Fighting… has never been my strong suit. But, I understand what you're asking of me. I won't give up easily, no matter who or what I'm up against!

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Th-thank you! Sorry if I've been a bother... Please make sure to take care of yourself before helping me. I wouldn't know what to do with this power if something happened to you... But please, know how much I cherish y—Er, I mean, know how much I cherish your help!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Wow, beautiful… Oh, I'd better put them away first.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Hey, I've been hearing about you for ages! How? Lollo Logistics has stations everywhere, so news travels fast! And, in case you don't know, you're the talk of Jinzhou!

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: This Terminal ringtone? Yeah, I made it! Thought it'd be a cool way to get the Lollo Logistics name out there… It's catchy, right? My colleagues thought so too and all started using it. Now it's ringing everywhere.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: This is Squeakie, my plushie. Here, give it a squeeze—isn't it adorable? I made it when I first joined Lollo Logistics. Everything was new, I mean, scarily new… and I was super nervous about the job… So having Squeakie around was such a comfort!

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: My nail polish is all chipped off… Time for a new color! When I first moved to the city, I tried all sorts of looks so I could fit in, but always ended up looking silly! Now… Now I've found my own style. So, what color d'you think I should go with?

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: I never left my village growing up, but once I did, I became a restless traveler. Riding my bike with the wind in my ears just feels amazing. I keep meeting new people, and saying goodbye to them… it's all part of the journey, isn't it? I bet you're the same, always on the move. Great way of living, right? I think... we'll surely meet again somewhere down the road. And when we do, let's grab some local food and catch up on our adventures!

audios.title: Lumi's_Hobby
audios.description: I jot down all the interesting sights, people, and events in my travel journal. If words don't cut it, I sketch it out. I've filled up so many journals since joining Lollo Logistics!

audios.title: Lumi's_Trouble
audios.description: There's never enough time! Delivering packages, planning new routes, catching up with friends, keeping my journal... Oh I wish I could be in a million places at once！

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Rice noodles are my absolute favorite! Spice it up with chili, a dash of vinegar, sprinkle some green onions... delicious! Next time you're in Yuezhou, I'll treat you!

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Hmm... What did they call it? Some local speciality noodle I tried during a delivery, with this golden fish broth and green veggies. Did NOT taste as good as it looked—ugh, it was so bitter! Never again!

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Wow, ever since we got a road in our village, things have been crazy! We've built so much new stuff. I've been keeping an eye on my team, making sure everyone's good—some want promotions, some need more cash for their fams, and some wanna travel. Hehe, busy days, but it feels great to be needed... I should keep it up!

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: This on my head? It's my employee ID badge. Clipped it to my hair to save myself the fumbling when I'm carrying stuff. Now everyone knows my name in a snap. Perfect!

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: That day, I left my village, hiked over the mountain, farther than anyone else had gone before. I soon found myself in a vast field, the air fresh and damp with dew. I was so pumped that I started to glow, and the light attracted Tacet Discords... Did everything I could to fight them off, then I blacked out. Next thing I knew, a Lollo Logistics team saved me, their lights cutting through the darkness, the brightest I've ever seen.

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: When I am out delivering packages, I can't always find a place to stay, so sometimes I rest outdoors. Once, I woke up to see Miss Jianxin napping on a boulder on the cliff edge! She seemed... so light, like a feather...

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: Ma Xiao...oops, I mean Chixia, hehe! Ahem, Patroller Chixia's packages are mostly snacks and hero play merchs. She was so stoked last time she got one, she practically bounced out of the room!

audios.title: About_Youhu
audios.description: Youhu's packages always come with insurance, full of pricey antiques. I don't know much about these stuff, but the way she handles them, you can tell they're her treasures.

audios.title: About_Baizhi
