audios.description: Researcher Baizhi's packages weigh a ton! Mostly stacks of books, thick ones, and a bunch of other weird stuff. Said those are for research purposes...

audios.title: About_Zhezhi
audios.description: Actually, I rarely get to meet Miss Zhezhi in person… She's a night owl, barely out during the day. So I've been dropping her paints and paper at her door.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Auntie Panhua's letting me use her stove today. In my village, we celebrate birthdays with steaming longevity noodles like this, topped with two braised eggs! Hey, you gotta slurp it all in one go, no biting allowed! Hehe… Happy birthday! May your journey ahead always be bright.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: Squeakie! Enough playing with the letter!

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Greetings! Lumi here! Need to send some mail? I've got you covered as Lollo Logistics' professional navigator!

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Don't worry, my light's got you!

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: A new page in my journal!

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Is it just me, or is the light bulb on my tail brighter than before?

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: To chart new routes for Lollo Logistics, physical training is a must.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: You're an amazing teacher! Didya know? Squeakie's jumping higher and faster after your pointers!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: They used to call me Jolly Sun in my village. I prefer Lumi though! The sun sets at night, but I'm always ready to illuminate someone's way home!

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: So, you are saying I'm already a top-notch navigator? Really?… No, no, don't get too comfortable, Lumi! There's still a long way to go, gotta keep it up!

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Huh, you're lucky to have come across me—the undisputed master of antique appraisal! Now, what do we have here? Hand over your goodies and I'll take a look!

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Don't bother impressing me with your knowledge of antique appraisal, since hardly anyone knows it better than me! *self-satisfied snort* What I want in a friend is merely respect for ancient artifacts.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Hey, here's a secret–but don't go blabbing to anyone else. If you recite "Master Youhu's Poem Collection" by the City Hall, the Sentinel will totally bless you. Well, maybe it won't... but hey, at least *I'll* totally help you...

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Somehow you've been giving off antique vibes... Ahem! I'm being professional here! Your frequencies! Some of them feel recent, but some feel like they're from ancient times. It's... special...

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Antiques aren't just about how much they're worth, but the feelings they hold. For example, if an item can record this moment in time, a memory of you and me together... That will make it super important. Yes... It will be priceless... To me, at least!

audios.title: Youhu's_Hobby
audios.description: I am Master Youhu, the best antique appraiser ever! Needless to say my favorite is antiques of all kinds. Some say I talk too much, but hey, if they brought me cool stuff, I'd zip it real quick. No lie.

audios.title: Youhu's_Trouble
audios.description: Treasures are plenty if you look, but stealing is a total bore. Catching baddies dusk till dawn, that's what I do all along.*Yawn* Still got a bunch of losers who haven't returned what they took. Let's see who's so unlucky to cross paths with yours truly, Master Youhu!

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Loong Buns are cool, they're like our tribute to the great Loongs. Food Ration Bars are cool too, they remind me of our soldier's dedication. Obviously, only the best meaningful food could ever impress Master Youhu!

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Ugh, plain tea is so bitter! Who even likes that? I'll just find a chance to dump it in the cup of whoever bothers me next time. Hehe!

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: Why would I do this whole antique appraisal thing? To make sure the antiques end up with the right people, of course! I'm like, the go-to for anyone who actually appreciates these things. And those snotty fakers and liars? I'll show 'em what's up. Aww, it's sure tough being such an honest and awesome appraiser like me!

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Nothing's ever perfect in this world, and this jade ring is no exception... Ahh, you're curious? My story isn't free, ya know! My antique appraisal fee is... Oh wait, it's my day off. I don't work for money today. Bye-bye!

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: I've been a genius since I was born! Like this one time, I met a dude who made bank by dissing real antiques, so he could sell them later for way more. Had the face to call himself an appraiser, huh. So I snuck into his place, stole his secrets, and posted them on the gate of the market. Pretty cool, right? Only problem was I was eight years old and couldn't run fast enough from him. *hiss*… Ugh, the pain in my head is still fresh even after all these years.

audios.title: About_Lingyang
audios.description: That Liondancer... Lingyang, I think? He surely knows how to come up with those Lucky Greetings. They sound cool. Almost as cool as my poems, I'll give him that!

audios.title: About_Mortefi
audios.description: Even though I haven't chatted with him much, I can tell that Mortefi dude is a man of culture. Fingers crossed he becomes my client one day!

audios.title: About_Chixia
audios.description: A Patroller... Uhh, gotta stay away from her... Hey, I've done nothing bad! Just used a few... tricks, to get back what belongs to the right people. Surely that's not a crime... right?

audios.title: About_Danjin
audios.description: We're about the same age, but Danjin's much taller than me... The jade she wears is so pretty! *sigh*... It's a shame I can't feel a single joyful frequency from it...

audios.title: About_Jianxin
audios.description: What's up with that mirror she carries, you ask? Oh my, oh my! That's a big, BIG secret. Not for your ears!

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: So, I accidentally heard it's your birthday today. And because we're like, friends or something, I made you this wooden statue of the Sentinel. It's said to protect you on your trips. Yeah, I just whipped it up on a whim! W-What do you mean it takes other people months to finish? Well I'm just amazingly talented, so of course it only took me half a day!

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Hmm...  Can't seem to figure out these scratch marks... Ummm... Ugh!

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: Hmhmm... Aha! What, you want a bite?

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Time may deceive, but wisdom takes hold. Here comes Master Youhu, the great antique appraiser!

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Woah! Hehe... Wanna catch me huh, you thieves?

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: New goodies to see? I'm in!

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Just so you know, while I charge little for antique appraisals, fighting's gonna be a different price!

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: Alright, I'll humor you for a bit, since I'm feeling good today!

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Geez, you're actually giving me all of these? Good call!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Well, I'm already super strong but... Thanks for the extra buff!

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Aha! Now I'm up to my eyes in goodies, and I've got the strength to keep 'em safe too!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: As per Master Youhu's professional opinion, I am invincible now! Those who don't appreciate antiques shall tremble before me!

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Such power should allow me to protect all the antiques in the world... Thanks to you, I'm no longer fighting alone... Ack! Nope. This is too embarrassing to say out loud!

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_II
audios.description: Luck is on MY side! Hehe... Waaahhh!

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_III
audios.description: Don't let your jaws drop yet! Hehe... Waaahhh!

audios.title: Injured_I
audios.description: Is that the best you got?

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: Worry not! Go ahead and open it! This master is here for ya!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: Outta my way! I want a look!

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: I had pictured our reunion in my head, again and again, after your departure. I wondered what kind of person you would become, how your days were spent, and if you achieved your goals. Countless questions filled my mind, but when I saw you again, there was only one thing I wanted to say: Welcome back. Back to the Black Shores, and… back to my side.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Time changes everything—Blake Blooms, Stellar Matrices, and the Black Shores—all constantly in flux. I've documented these changes, repairing the damage and preserving the good. Yet, I wonder... Am I doing enough? Have I earned your trust? These questions haunt me, but I press on, seeking solace in my work.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Your past... I promised to keep it a secret, at your own request. That day, I realized our reunion would be one-sided. This is why your memory loss didn't surprise me... But it doesn't matter now. You may have forgotten me, but I will remember everything about you, always.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Humans dream to fulfill their desires. For a long time, I believed such dreams were not meant for me, as I had never yearned for anything. Until one day... I dreamed of you. We were strolling through an unfamiliar land, basking in the warm sunlight. You showed me your world and shared stories of your past. You even brewed a cup of tea for me... Though only a figment of my imagination, I wished that moment could last a little longer.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Next time you journey to distant lands, could you bring me along? I don't want to watch from afar or hear secondhand about your adventures. I long to experience the unknown by your side, as your friend... Please, will you give me the chance?

audios.title: The_Shorekeeper's_Hobby
audios.description: Pressing a piano key creates an enchanting sound from the vibrating strings. Unlike other frequencies I've processed, a piano produces a pure, clear, and vivid tone. If I could one day communicate my emotions as simply and intuitively as humans do... If I could create my own melodies, would you be my first listener?

audios.title: The_Shorekeeper's_Trouble
audios.description: I cannot physically grow and age, and therefore can never truly comprehend the range of emotions that come with it as a human does. Despite my wealth of knowledge and ability to replicate others' experiences through the Sonoro, these feelings remain enigmatic to me, forever distant and unfamiliar.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Long ago, during our days together at the Black Shores, you used to prepare chowder for us, blending milk, seafood, and vegetables. One spoonful of its warmth could dispel the freezing sea wind and restore stamina. Despite multiple attempts, I cannnot seem to recreate that flavor.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: The food I hate... Hmm, hate might be too strong a word, but I tend to steer clear of pickled food, like preserved plums. While I appreciate their long shelf life, the fermented smell reminds me of their preserved nature.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: My purpose had been clear long before my creation: to build a safe haven from the unrelenting waves of the Lament, until humanity could find a path to a brighter tomorrow. It used to be my duty, but now... it is a choice. I am one with the Black Shores. I want to prevent more tragedies from happening, I want to protect everyone, I... I want to safeguard my connection with the world around me. This is my own will.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Ah, so you've noticed the crystal on my chest. It's not an adornment, but a fissure brimming with the energy emanating from my body. Through it, you can touch the core I've managed to keep safe since my creation. It resembles the kernel of a fruit, or the beating heart of a human, where the essence of life is preserved.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Remnant Energy coalesced into a crystal cocoon on a moonlit shore, stirred by the crashing waves, and the breath and heartbeat of a certain individual. That person then infused it with {Male=his;Female=her} own frequencies, and the butterfly within finally emerged... Yes, you've guessed it. You are the one I speak of, the force that gave me life and form.

audios.title: About_Camellya
audios.description: Though her words may not always align with her actions, she remains fiercely loyal to her desires. Her carefree lifestyle holds a certain charm, yes, but we were made differently, with distinct objectives to pursue. Following your example, I've allowed her to make her own choices, without limitations.

audios.title: About_Aalto
audios.description: A mature organization requires a personable and skilled negotiator, adept at forging connections with all they encounter. In the case of the Black Shores, that person is Aalto. His keen insight ensures he obtains crucial information precisely when needed. Beneath his playful smile lies a resolute determination to end the Lament. Despite other offers, he was destined for the Black Shores' path from the start.

audios.title: About_Encore
audios.description: Encore sees the world as a canvas for her boundless imagination. A warrior, a knight, or a little adventurer... In her tales, she can become anyone she wants to triumph over evil and reach a happy ending. Wherever she ventures, her radiant energy dispels dismay. Perhaps this is what Tethys saw in her when she was chosen.

audios.title: About_the_Black_Shores
audios.description: Atop this massive Tacetite lies the ideal “singularity” spot to observe the Lament. This is where we formed the Black Shores, its members distinguished by their Blake Blooms. Beneath the endless stars, humanity's light glimmers. That light belongs to those who had given their lives to illuminate a brighter future for all. I've welcomed countless such people into this place... and bid farewell to just as many.

audios.title: About_the_Tethys_System
audios.description: The Tethys System and I are creations of the same civilization, and we are bound by similar obligations. By human standards, we are of the same kind. Yet, our perceptions of emotions, humanity, and existence diverge, leading us down distinctly separate paths.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday, {PlayerName}. You once taught me a person's birthday is their most important day. So, I've made it a habit to prepare something in advance for days like this... Please have this crystal—it's a piece of myself. Hold it, and you'll be enveloped in a personalized Sonoro Sphere, where you can change everything to your liking. Though I cannot bring you what you truly want, let me gift you a peaceful dream to escape your worries.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: The stars rest in silence, awaiting their fated journey.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Worry not if you don't remember me... I can always introduce myself again. I am the Shorekeeper, acting executive of the Black Shores, and the core computational unit of Tethys. Now and forever, I will stand by you and our home, through every yesterday and tomorrow.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: "The Shorekeeper"... This name suits me well enough. It aligns with my purpose and drive: they only exist because of you.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Understood. I am here to serve your will.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: I'll fulfill it, be it a direct command or any other wish you have.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Your return has cast a glimmer of change into my prolonged existence. It allows me to gain some understanding of a world beyond my reach.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: The energy within me gathers and evolves... like delicate threads on a loom, meticulously woven by your hands into a new part of my being.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: My crystal seems to glow brighter. I sense your warmth on my skin, flowing from your touch, reaching deep inside my chest.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: I believe I have received an invaluable treasure from you... Something infinitely close to what humans call a "soul."

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: I lack a heart, yet my chest stirs whenever I see you. Thump, thump... I would compare it to the emergence of a butterfly, or the birth of a star; not a sudden rush, but a gradual, growing pulse. I want more of you. Yearn to be with you always. This longing I feel… I am certain now. It must be love.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: Please have them. I hope they will prove useful.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: I'm always on the go, collecting treasures, helping my friends, making costumes, and repairing stage props... It's a busy routine, but seeing everyone smiling makes it all worth it.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Pero's box is more than just a treasure trove. It's my private lounge as well. It's bigger than you might think, and I've stashed all my nifty gadgets inside. Would you like a tour? Knock, knock—open up, Pero.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Apparently, the mix of my over-the-top gestures and stoic face is hilarious to people. See? Just like that. Oh, did I actually get a chuckle out of you? Guess I'll keep this style going, then.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: Our troupe never lets anyone feel left out. We accept everyone, chasing away their worries and inviting them to be a part of the performance. If you ever feel down or sad, come see us. I'd really like to see you smile.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: People say family is about helping and comforting each other. I feel safe and warm around you... So, maybe you count as family after all?

audios.title: Roccia's_Hobby
audios.description: I like turning the things I collect into stage props. They might not look fancy at first, but each one has its own special story. On stage, the ordinary becomes extraordinary, and I think that's worth something.

audios.title: Roccia's_Trouble
audios.description: Cleaning up the ship is always a headache. There's algae, sewage spills, and torn canvas everywhere... And of course, there's always that person who conveniently disappears when it's time to pitch in. Pft, not like a good living and performance space is important or anything. You agree, right?

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Spaghetti Bolognese is great on its own, but it's even better when shared. Maybe... it's the company that makes it taste better?

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Every time I see the mess those drunkards leave behind... Ugh, I just want to dump all the booze into the ocean.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: One day, the streets of Ragunna will be alive with the spirit of freedom. Until then, I want it to grow within our troupe. We'll make the sad smile, help the hopeless dream again, give courage to the fearful, and remind everyone of who we really are.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Pero is my best friend. She's amazing. She can detect special frequencies on objects, carry all my stuff, and even absorb good and bad feelings and inspirations. But don't worry, she won't gobble up anything harmful, dangerous, or anything that belongs to someone.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Luceanite pebbles, if not collected in time, will lose their glow and turn to dust. I used to be one of those lost pebbles, until the Troupe of Fools came along and saved me. Now, I can help other lost souls with my own little light.

audios.title: About_Brant
audios.description: Brant is the greatest captain in all of Solaris. At least, that's what he insists I say. But it's true, having him around really does bring out the best in us. His passion is infectious, and his belief in freedom is like the mast that keeps us all steady.

audios.title: About_Carlotta
audios.description: Leading a large family is like steering a massive ship. It requires immense effort to keep it on course. I have firsthand experience in managing a vessel, and I admire her energy and bravery in navigating this journey.

audios.title: About_Zani
audios.description: Zani is the definition of a proper adult. Working with her is so easy, so comfortable, and I never have to worry about anything going wrong...

audios.title: About_Phoebe
audios.description: She's from the Order of the Deep. I don't know her very well, but… she was the first Acolyte to touch the box without getting bitten by Pero.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: There's a new show in the works, a little something we've been rehearsing. Come check it out if you have the time. Spoiler alert... It's kind of important you're there for the show to work. Why? Because you're the main character! Happy birthday!

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Hello, name's Roccia. Besides being the Troupe of Fools' first mate, I am also a stage mechanic and an improv performer. If you ever stumble upon something interesting, I'm a really good listener. Pero stores all that inspiration, and I'll spin it into a new improv act.

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: All the world's a stage, and we are mere players.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Pero's tummy is rumbling. Inspiration, don't be shy!

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: Tornado makers, dimension-warping lamps... I've got all kinds of props if you're interested.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Pero said she's feeling good. Get ready for her happy dance!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Pero said she's feeling like she can take out a hundred foes with one punch!

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Pero said she likes you even more now. Seems her strength and confidence are growing fast.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Pero said she finally has the power to protect everyone she cares about.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Pero said she's grateful for how far she's come, thanks to you... Ahem. Sorry, scratch that. Pero never actually said any of that. It's all me, Roccia. Those are the things I've been wanting to tell you.

audios.title: Resonance_Skill_III
audios.description:
Up we go, Pero.
PERO: Haah!

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_I
audios.description:
All the world's a stage.
PERO: Pero! Hmph!

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_II
audios.description:
Time for some crowd work.
PERO: Pero! Rawrrr!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_II
audios.description: No, Pero. That's not for you.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Before our paths crossed, I'd only heard stories about you from Grandfather. But Ragunna is rather secluded, and not all the tales that reach us remain true. I found myself wondering who you really were, and you surpassed every expectation. Your arrival didn't just disrupt the delicate balance in Ragunna, it also shed light on doubts and hesitations that had kept me trapped for so long.

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: Be light and swift, steady and precise. One hand on the waist, the other on the shoulder. Let the momentum carry you into a perfect arc as you spin… Hehe, you see? Combat and ballroom dancing do share a few similarities, wouldn't you agree?

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: In our family, we encounter all sorts of people, but they generally fall into three categories: the wealthy, the poor, and young newcomers with nothing to lose. Regardless, those that intrigue me the most are the ones with a fire in their eyes. You see, those who don't know what they truly want are often adrift, chasing after everything but never holding onto a thing.

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: I've come to find a genuine pleasure working with you—truly, I do not say this out of formality. Whether it's business or not, I truly cherish every moment we share.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: You have the most beautiful eyes. When you're focused intently, they shine like gems... I must admit, I find myself captivated. So, why not keep me in your sights a little longer? Perhaps then, I could be the one to make that sparkle even brighter.

audios.title: Carlotta's_Hobby
audios.description: The beauty of art shouldn't be confined by a viewer's knowledge or taste. Whether it's the latest trends, timeless classics, or avant-garde surrealism, each offers a unique vantage point. What I truly admire is the emotion and passion artists pour into their work. That's why I connect them with patrons who can truly appreciate their vision, ensuring their brilliance is recognized and valued.

audios.title: Carlotta's_Trouble
audios.description: Long ago, I witnessed a storm that I will never forget. The air was suffocating, damp, and tinged with a faint, rusty odor. I stood there in silence, feeling utterly helpless. Since that day, I've faced many more storms. Instead of retreating, I choose to walk into the rain, seeking justice before it can wash away all the blood and pain. Now that I think about it, perhaps it wasn't the rain itself I loathed, but what it brought with it. After all, it's difficult to hold onto one's dignity in a downpour, and in those moments, we all reveal parts of ourselves we'd rather keep hidden.

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: When it comes to flavors, I don't have any particular preferences. But isn't it curious how food can take on a meaning of its own depending on the company? Take my family, for instance—we say true unity only comes after sharing a bottle of honeyed wine and a slice of orange pie. What do you think? Shall we try that next time?

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: Have you ever attended one of those lavish traditional banquets? The portions are modest, but the pomp is overwhelming. Silver bowls, crystal goblets, and gem-studded plates parade before you, each one more ostentatious than the last, all to flaunt the host's wealth... Before you can even begin to eat, you must endure dozens of needless formalities. To me, they seem to forget that true decorum and elegance are not about such excess.

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: The Montellis' legacy is built and sustained by every member of the our family. We know the world is far greater than Ragunna or Rinascita alone. Just as our ancestors once ventured into the unknown, we too must continue to chart new courses. Now, a golden opportunity lies before us... I need only to seize it and take that step forward. Perhaps more than just one.

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Everyone who handles family directives has a codename, each with a matching token. Mine is the opal. While they do shine and dazzle, my opals aren't real jewels. They're merely crystals reshaped by my Forte. Whether as decorations or ammunition, I use them to create the brilliance I desire.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: My past is no secret within my family or among old acquaintances… I've been called many things: the abandoned orphan, descendant of the lesser branch, prominent young lady, and efficient executor. Each title represents a part of me, though none capture the whole. To dance on the edge of danger, one must learn to wear many masks. For the future of the Montelli family, I will play any role that's required of me.

audios.title: About_Brant
audios.description: He's the captain leading his crew through tempestuous seas, and I often wonder whether his gaze from the deck reveals ambition, or selflessness and passion. Our family once extended an invitation to him, but he declined, remarking, "A captain's ship is his alone, and he will never abandon it." Thus, we remain partners with aligned interests, and that suits us just fine.

audios.title: About_Roccia
audios.description: I've always been curious about something. Just how much can her box, Pero, actually hold? New designs, costumes, the fine wines the troupe keeps hidden, shimmering sea gems and shells... And Roccia's thoughts and feelings, too. Though Roccia herself rarely speaks her mind, Pero seems to reveal them all.

audios.title: About_Phoebe
audios.description: Phoebe is as pure and innocent as a budding lily. Her kindness and devotion are beyond question. Yet, without sufficient strength, such virtues might lead one into the trap of blind faith. I mean no disrespect, but this is a dilemma every believer faces at some point—whether they are following a mere illusion shaped by others' agendas or upholding principles and beliefs that truly have meaning.

audios.title: About_Zani
audios.description: Zani is wary of unnecessary, inefficient tasks because she excels at completing her work with haste, precision, and quality. Although it may seem that these aspects contradict each other, they actually complement one another. The family imposes few restrictions on private commissions, so if you have a challenging request, feel free to approach her. Oh, but do ensure the compensation is appropriate.

audios.title: About_Francesco
audios.description: Some people see family as a matter of blood and heritage, while others, unbound by such conventions, consider those who share their ideals as family. I am deeply grateful for the protection, opportunities, and insight Grandfather has given me, along with the pride of being a Montelli. He embodies the spirit of the Montelli family, and I am determined to honor his legacy. Like him, I will lead our family forward with action, as a true Montelli would.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday, {PlayerName}. I must confess, ever since I found out about your birthday, I've been thinking about the perfect gift for you. You likely already possess many treasures, so I wanted mine to be something unique, practical, and delightful—something that would bring you joy and remind you of me. So, here it is: a pistol reshaped by my Forte. It symbolizes that you have the freedom to do as you wish. Whether or not you're a Montelli, this promise holds true, always, in the name of Carlotta Montelli.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: Bang. The white has been dyed red.

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: To shine or to die? Merely two sides of the same coin.

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I am Carlotta Montelli, the second lady of the Montelli family. In certain situations, I might also be known as Opal. I have a talent for uncovering value and solving problems. Whether it's for business or building friendships, you can rely on me. If you're interested in closer collaboration... well, that's certainly possible. However, are you prepared to offer your faith, life, and future in exchange?

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: Fate has led you to me, and considering the terms I'm offering… You wouldn't refuse me, would you?

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: Let's prove our value to each other.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: See? I always choose the winning side—yours.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: New investments, new deals… I promise you won't be disappointed.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: Now, my Forte can reshape even more. Your labour has truly borne fruit.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Such delightful and irresistible power. Well, now we have another shared secret.

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Your generosity is as unwavering as ever. But how should I repay you? After all, the most precious things are often those that defy definition.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: The opal shines even more brightly… It seems you find greater pleasure in the crafting process itself than in the finished gems.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Indeed, very well. Please, continue… Heh, did you not expect me to say that? I relish all the experiences you offered and make no secret of the ambition stirred. So, see this through—what I wish for and what I can offer go far beyond what is presented now.

audios.title: Resonance_Liberation_V
audios.description: In the name of the Montellis.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: I've got some time today. What would you say to a nice stroll on the beach? Maybe the sea breeze and ocean sunset will inspire you!

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: When sailing the seas, always remember to set your course first, and then... adapt to whatever comes your way!

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: Hey, here to see our performance? Take this ticket. No need to bring anything, just a smile and a heart full of excitement. But if you insist… Well, when I step on stage, be sure to give me all the applause and cheers you've got!

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: All I think about on stage is losing myself in the role—the stage becomes "my" entire world, with every light, note, and movement telling "my" story. Up there, the world is my oyster. But once I step off, I'm just a minor character in the tale of Solaris.

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: See that? Over there, just around the corner—that's Trattoria Margherita. Nearly everyone in our troupe has walked this alley; it's where we grew up. Out at sea, I'd wonder how Ragunna could turn its back on us, or what I'd do when I finally returned. I pictured a hundred things… but now, standing here, all I want is a slice of pizza... The sights and sounds of this city have always been a part of me.

audios.title: Brant's_Hobby
audios.description: The boundless sea is the grandest stage, its towering waves our most thunderous applause! We sail with the currents and winds, hunting for cheers and laughter on every distant shore. Therefore, my friend, lift your voice and dance with abandon—for you, for me, and for every day we have lived in full!

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Here, try this wine… A bit too sweet? Haha, that's just my "Strength!" Everyone's brew tastes different, you know. Battier's has a spicy edge, Tina's is rather refreshing. This is the Troupe's Strength… a blend of everyone's life.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description: For me, any food's fair game. C'mon, don't overthink it! When you're hungry enough, everything tastes amazing!

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: One day, our troupe will sail to every corner of the world, and every wave will echo a shared story—the tale of the Fools!

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: Take this telescope and see for yourself… Even the highest clouds feel close enough to touch, don't they? With this gadget, you'll catch every thrill onstage and every "new world" waiting out at sea.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: Unforgettable adventures? Where to start? How about an ancient trial that spanned over a century?

audios.title: About_Roccia
audios.description: Don't be fooled by our First Mate's age—if you ever need performance advice, she's your go-to. Plus, she's also an excellent stage designer!

audios.title: About_Carlotta
audios.description: She's got her course set and sticks to it, no matter what. Living as a Montelli is no easy path, but she's determined to make her own way. And mark my words, when her performances draw to a close, she'll be known not just as a Montelli, but Carlotta.

audios.title: About_Cartethyia
audios.description: Some call her a saint; others, a sinner. But who is she really? No one cares how she treats her friends or faces her foes. The Order's tales never speak of her dreams, and the legends conceal her heart's desire. Everyone has heard of Cartethyia—but does anyone know the person behind that name?

audios.title: About_Zani
audios.description: Many wear masks to fit in, but not her. Whatever her past, whatever roles she's played, she's here now, true to herself.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy birthday, my dear friend! Got any plans today? How about slipping away with me for a little adventure? I'll even let you take the helm. Here, hold on tight—together, we'll sail into the far horizon!

audios.title: Idle_III
audios.description: Hey, little one... There you go!

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: Brant's the name, captain of the Fool's Troupe! A pleasure to meet you, and please, call me whatever you'd like, for I'm but a humble Fool in pursuit of freedom. Enough with introductions now. Let's hand the stage over to everlasting joy and boundless liberty!

audios.title: Greeting
audios.description: The curtains pull back and I'm here to hunt for every laugh! Brant, at your service. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.

audios.title: Join_Team_I
audios.description: The course is determined. Time to set sail!

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: With this, the stage is set for a grand opening. Come on, trim the sails!

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: More power... Now we're storm-proof and unstoppable! Let's go, full speed ahead!

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: We're smooth sailing now. Onto the next stop... Hard to portside!

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: With your strength, this massive wave is just a splash in our show! Bring it on!

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Haha! Now this is the strength worthy of a true swordsman of the seas! Join me on this voyage to the world's end, my friend! Together, we'll face that fleeting moment when the world turns upside down!

audios.title: Supply_Chest_III
audios.description: You earned it, you keep it.

audios.title: Thoughts_I
audios.description: Shhh.... how come you're all here? Ah, sorry {PlayerName}, didn't mean to disturb you. I just wanted to pay you a visit. Didn't expect these guys to tag along...

audios.title: Thoughts_II
audios.description: {PlayerName}, how did you meet Abby? Sorry, I don't mean to pry, it's just the two of you are inseparable, always looking out for each other, always trusting one another. It's wonderful, Abby must be... like family.

audios.title: Thoughts_III
audios.description: I know disciples of the Order should not form "attachments" to Echoes. But they're my dear friends, and that will never change. This must be one of the Sentinel's trials, a test to see if I can fulfill my duties as an Acolyte while holding onto such... ties. It's a good test of my resolve. It's just, every time I see them, I want to hug them tightly... No, no, no, I must resist!

audios.title: Thoughts_IV
audios.description: You always seem so busy, but I hardly ever see you resting... Are you, perhaps, having trouble sleeping? If that's the case, I can help. Just a little tap with my staff and your mind will be at ease... Hmm? Where are you going? It won't hurt at all...

audios.title: Thoughts_V
audios.description: Balloons soaring into the bright blue sky, people and Echoes rejoicing under rainbows... When the Laurel was placed upon your head, I felt so happy. This Carnevale has been spectacular in every way, and it will remain etched in my heart forever.

audios.title: Phoebe's_Hobby
audios.description: When I was little, I loved going to Whisperwind Haven with friends. We'd lie on slopes surrounded by flowers and watch the clouds drift by. Tilly would play their accordion, and Livia and Brenno would weave all sorts of garlands that left a wonderful scent in their wake. I still go back sometimes... in secret.

audios.title: Phoebe's_Trouble
audios.description: I saw shadows where light could not reach. What if the path I once believed in so fervently was never the right one? Then... No, never mind. Please don't mind me...

audios.title: Favorite_Food
audios.description: Something smells so good... It must be Miss Margherita's pizza cooked to perfection by Bakie... No, no, no, this month's Pizza Day already passed. What is Pizza Day you ask? It's the only day of the month we were allowed pizza at the orphanage. Even though I don't go hungry anymore, as an Acolyte I must resist gluttony.... Besides, the best pizza is one that's shared with friends.

audios.title: Disliked_Food
audios.description:
Everything we eat comes from the good earth created by the Sentinel. According to Them, "Our bodies are vessels for our souls." Therefore, we must sustain that vessel with things that are beneficial to it, such as those found in the sacred Viscum Berry. I still have a few left, would you like to try one? The Codex says sharing makes life sweeter... 

Ooof... they're still really sour...

audios.title: Ideals
audios.description: I hope for children to be by their parent's side. For sailors to return home after long voyages. For all to soar, free as birds. For people to come together despite their differences. For the Lament to not drive people apart... Huh? What do I hope for myself? I hope... I...

audios.title: Chat_I
audios.description: This locket was a gift from my father. I always thought it had sunk with that merchant ship, but here it is again in my hands. This itself is already a miracle... I cannot ask for more.

audios.title: Chat_II
audios.description: When I was a child, I awoke on a dark shore. I walked that shore for what felt like forever until I saw a light... a few kind Acolytes of the Order brought me to a brightly lit room. They fed me, sheltered me, and treated me well. Eventually, they became my adoptive family... Sometimes when the rain lashed out at night, Livia and Brenno would cuddle up next to me until I fell asleep. With them at my side... I never felt lonely.

audios.title: About_Brant
audios.description: Mother once told me a story about an adventurer braving storms in search of freedom. When I saw Brant on stage, he reminded me of that adventurer, caring for naught while the ocean thrashes around him... Sometimes, I think Mr. Brant chooses to act out a life of equal parts comedy and tragedy.

audios.title: About_Roccia
audios.description: Miss Roccia might appear ice cold, but at heart, I know she is a gentle and caring person. Her kindheartedness brings smiles to all those around her. And then there's her friend, Pero. I wonder if there's any chance Pero could also be my friend?

audios.title: About_Cartethyia
audios.description: ...I once dreamt of a black sea, with swells growing larger and more violent. Amidst the spray, the Blessed Maiden appeared—or at least I think it was her. Something in that swaying silhouette resembled her, yet it also felt so unlike her...

audios.title: About_Zani
audios.description: Not everyone in Ragunna worships the Sentinel. Certain Acolytes of the Order believe a person's worth is solely measured by their piety... But Miss Zani is brave and dependable, which just might be enough to overcome existing prejudices. After all, she's such a reliable and respectable person.

audios.title: Birthday_Wishes
audios.description: Happy Birthday! Ooh... confetti! Just like how Mama and Papa used to celebrate. Here, take this, a bluebird set with aquamarine gemstones. A little something to be by your side through winds and storms. Like this statue, may your eyes always be bright, and may luck always be with you. Your path is not one ordained by the Sentinel, but one of your own making. And no matter where you go, I will always pray for you.

audios.title: Idle_I
audios.description: May Thy love endure forever, never ceasing.

audios.title: Idle_II
audios.description: Hm... Eh? Oh, there you are! Who's a good boy...

audios.title: Self-Introduction
audios.description: I'm Phoebe, an Acolyte of the Order. Praise the Sentinel. May They guide you to compassion and enlightenment.

audios.title: Join_Team_II
audios.description: I resolve disputes in the Sentinel's name.

audios.title: Join_Team_III
audios.description: May the Sentinel guide those who are lost.

audios.title: Ascension_I
audios.description: The sparkling sea knows no bounds.

audios.title: Ascension_II
audios.description: Do I have what it takes to fight the forces of darkness?

audios.title: Ascension_III
audios.description: Your light has shown me a world I had never seen.

audios.title: Ascension_IV
audios.description: Thanks to you, my light will shine upon those in need.

audios.title: Ascension_V
audios.description: Held aloft by the rapids, I saw a golden glow... Your wisdom and grace have become gospel which I shall forever hold dear.

audios.title: Enemies_Near
audios.description: Dark forces approach, be on guard.

audios.title: Supply_Chest_I
audios.description: Cherish the gift not given lightly.
